I have seen this a half dozen times, but I rented it again to watch it with my wife before seeing Red 2 at the show.  The sequel is even better. Waiting for the director's cut twin pack if/when it comes out.

I LOVE THIS MOVIE!!!  Since purchasing RED I can't tell you how many times I've watched it. My husband also loves the action, humor and how perfectly the actor's characters mesh. It is at the same time exciting, thrilling, humorous and the whole time I'm thinking WOW!! I really like Bruce Willis as an actor and this action role is different from the Die Hard series. I ABSOLUTELY LOVE THIS MOVIE!! I'm so glad that I bought it because I can watch it over and over again.

I saw the first 30 minutes of the movie.  I did not get to finish the movie. I generally download the movies at work, I look at the movies on lunch break.  I do not have WIFI connection at home.  I will have to rent the movie again.
But, I do like the movie.

Rita

Great movie. Not very close to reality, but who watches movies like this for its real life content? Good story line, great bunch of actors- they all fit well together. Automatic weapons are a bit much, but like I said who watches this stuff for reality? Yes, I'm a Willis fan, and yes, I will by Red 2. Buy it and enjoy.
Good movie, with a great cast! I like Bruce Willis and this movie is typical for his genre - action/shoot-em' up etc. Very entertaining!
You couldn't ask for a greater cast, this movie is sooooo good.  Saw Red 2 in the theater and looking forward to the DVD release in just a few weeks.

It's great fun to see Dame Helen Mirren handle an automatic rifle.....  to watch John Malkovich play crazy...  Bruce Willis is at his most charming, and Morgan Freeman is (as always) solid....  If you can stand a few "blow em up" sequences and a lot of violence (which is half serious, half parody) you'll thoroughly enjoy this and its "feel good" ending.
This movie is easily one of my top 5 favorite. These four actors have a ton of fun in this movie and you can't help but laugh with them!

This is a terrific movie with a lot of action and you tend to laugh a lot. I have watched Red about 5 times and can always watch it again. I'm so glad they made a Red 2 and hopefully they will make a Red 3. What good entertainment!

Is this film perfect? No, but what film out there is anymore? Most films nowadays, for me anyway just aren't worthy of my time effort or money. This one is the exception. I was a bit skeptical about it, but rented it anyway. I'm a fan of Morgan Freeman from his early days on The Electric Company, and Helen Mirren. This film didn't disappoint me. Freeman and Mirren are great and aptly cast here. Mirren has you believing she is the character portrays. Story has it that during filming of this one she was so believable cast members were a bit leery of her. Now that is good acting. But, hey, she's British and British trained and when it comes to acting, they know what they are doing.
Overall, this is a great film I look forward to watching again from time to time.
I like to watch movies over and over and was glad to get this movie. Like this DVD no problems.
It is clever, funny, with superior acting and lots of action.  There is nothing more to say, and it is foolish to require more.

I love this movie, total nonsense.  Absolutely impossible of course, who cares?  The cast is outstanding  Freeman, Mirren are totally perfect.  Willis is just exactly what he should be in this almost parody of his Die Hard stuff, totally great, AND Malkovich is absolutely completely and just plain Wow in his role.  He steals the movie completely, nobody better.  The movie is a total romp, just plain fun.
Better than expected and nice that it has a comedy flair to it even though it's an action flick. Great movie and great cast.
Strong cast and lots of action. Willis and Malkovich's good old fashion sinester and mentallyunstable scary performance make this a decent view.

There's something about coming home from a long work week and not wanting to use your head too much. Some popcorn, a bottle of wine, Bruce Willis, explosions, cheesy lines - are all a girl needs to feel relaxed.

Awesome cast, easy to follow storyline and feel good times.
Lots of action! That's for sure, it was good enough to want to see how it turns out. Liked the ending.

Enjoyed another book in the Circle series--compelled to get the next book to see what happens.  I am usually not a sci fi fan but got hooked on Black and now it is necessary to continue reading the series to get the whole picture and see how Bruce Willis finally pulls his two realities together.
It was all the spy stuff you would and could expect. It shows how our government (one can) easily become corrupt and use our military resources for personal gain. Very entertaining and funny.

Hey, I'm 61 - I love it when the older generation gets one over on the younger generation.  This movie wonderfully displays the old adage "Age and treachery will always defeat youth and zeal."  The movie makes me excited to be R.E.D.
Great show. I like funny movies and I like action movies and if I can get both in one flick, kudos!
Alot of the humor etc. is geared toward senior citizens or over 50. Funny parts and lots of good action, Bruce Willis is one of the greatest actors, just old
We love this movie and the cast!!!  If you're ready for a spoof with a lot of laughs -- watch RED.  It arrived on time and in good condition.
This is an adventure full of surprises with our favorite Bruce Willis' cool character, but spiced up with comedy as well.  A fun movie to enjoy.
Mary Louise Parker is excellent in this Red and the newer version of Red 2. Recommend it highly. I would hope that thry continue the franchise of characters.
Love all the characters and the deadpan humor. Fun ride. Just saw Red 2 and it was also a decent movie.
this is a good movie it's nice to see Hollywood get together once in awhile. these old school guys need to get together more often.
this movie was fun to watch. All the old pros were funny. It arrived in a timely manner and in good condition. The price was right too.
I bought this video so I can watch it prior to getting the latest Red in the saga. Not disappointed by my decision.

I enjoyed the movie as a fairy tale (figured this out shortly) as I assume the director didn't want to get all detail oriented and probably wanted to focus on the story a bit more. Okay job on not having so many guns with unlimited ammunition, showing belt fed guns or more frequent mag changes, but still unrealistic deployment of some of the weapons (RPG, grenade launcher).  In addition, I was uncomfortable with the "good guys" shooting at CIA, FBI, Secret Service, and Police Officers; why would we commend killing likely innocent service men of our country.

RED was quite good as an secret agent action film. It was surprisingly clean but the quick action was neither unbelievable nor transparent.  Aside from perhaps a short scene with needles I couldn't even categorize it as graphic -just a little fun shoot 'em up story line with lots of lights and booms.  I am definitely looking forward the RED 2.
Amazing action all long movie. Highly recommended for those who enjoy pure dynamite. Never be bore during the thriller.  It will hold you tight to your seat.
I have watched it many times on tv and had to have it for my collection.  It is one that I will watch for a fun viewing.

Better than the sequel.  all these actors work together well.  It's nice to see a film where all the action heroes are not in their twenties or thirties.  this was a real joy to watch, even my kids liked it.
Great movie but could have done without the f word. one whoso three four five six seven eight nine ten.
I love all the actors in this movie. Lots of action from characters that aren't so young anymore! I also ordered Red 2.
Targeting  baby boomers. We enjoyed this film. The casting  could not have  been better. It is a film for desert dwellers, or a cold snowy day.
Start studded movie with lots of funny scenes and special effects. Some of the scenes were a little too predictable for my taste, hence the dropped star.
I have seen this movie about 5 times. It is one of the better Bruce Willis movies with a great cast of stars. It has everything, drama,comedy, suspense and action. I want to see the new sequel.

One of Bruce Willis' best films. While it should maybe be considered dark comedy considering the subject matter, it is hard to think of it that way since everything is treated so lightly, somewhat tongue-in-cheek. Besides Bruce Willis having an even more comedic role than usual, Mary-Louise Parker is a delight, as is Helen Mirren as an ex-MI6 sniper and John Malkovich as ex-CIA "crazy man".
Tongue in cheek spy thriller, a few really funny scenes, some suspense.some sad. Good casting choices. Willis was Willis, love Morgan Freeman.
The cast of characters in this movie is fantastic.  Great chemistry!  Every character was great!  Definitely a movie for the library!
The movie was a traditional butt kicking action film for guys who like movies. The best part is watching for free with amazon prime.

Love this movie. Great cast. Clever dialogue. Funny without being too cliche or it's able to laugh at it's cliche in an intelligent way. Whatever, I was totally entertained and laughted alot. And Red II is off the charts even funnier. I made the mistake of watching it on a plane and had to physically control myself from laughing out too loud so as to not disturb the other passengers. That was really hard to do.
Bond, Bourne, Hunt for the older folks.  Just plain funny and off the cuff for adults and awesome for teens. Violent, but not overboard.  Great story and actors.
Enjoyed the ride. It was a funny film that was full of action. Of course I have always loved Bruce Willis.
I enjoyed this movie, especially because of the great older actors!  Can't get better than these guys (and gal)!  Would recommend for anyone who likes a bit of action with some old guys!
Poor choice and a waste of $1.99. Stay with Die Hard. Stay away - away - far away. Please and please
I had this movie on a long list of DVD to buy. I bought it on one of those days when I just needed to laugh. It delivered...funny dark almost shameful humor.  I love the entire cast.
I like the chemistry and artistry of the group, perfect. I like this movie, the story, cinematography and technology. BD for a fraction of price.

This movie was a good mix of action and humor.  The characters were fun to watch and the combination made for a fast moving and enjoyable movie overall.  This movie did not deep dive into plot or character development but it didn't need to and really wasn't that kind of spy movie.
Well done on cast and would recommend to anyone who likes these stars pass the popcorn please, thanks Oh I'll have a coke
I really enjoyed this movie overall.  I just really am tired of seeing old men with women young enough to be their daughters.  Other than that, I thought the movie was an enjoyable diversion.
Excellent!  I would recomment this very much!  It is very good!  I am glad I got it!  Thank you! :)
I really like this movie and am waiting for number 2 to come out on dvd. There's action, comedy just a good all round movie
I HAVE NOT SEEN THIS MOVIE IN A WHILE, BUT I REMEMBER IT BEING GOOD WITH A LOT OF ACTION. CAN'T WAIT TO SEE IT!
My husband wanted to watch this, so I acquiesced.  He fell asleep, as usual on a Friday night, but I really enjoyed it!
Streaming of movie worked very well. Would reorder other movies if desired to do so. Enjoyed the ease of ording.

Great humor coupled with lots of action.  I liked the comic book simplicity without excessive profanity, sex, and bloody gore.
Even with all the explosive action and shooting there was minimal blood and guts.  Entertaining with a great cast of characters.
Fun and lots of laughs.  Helen Mirren is the type of character you wished you lived next to.  Makes you realize that you may get old but your not dead yet.
I am glad I watched it so I can watch Red 2 coming soon to DVD. Pretty decent flick. aya

I just saw the previews for the second movie of this series so my husband insisted I watch the first. So glad that I did, usually with a cast of this magnitute the movies are lame. Not the case here, very funny, very good story line and I cannot wait to see the next one!
A good movie with great actors.  I really liked how the action scenes are put together.  Great time watch it!
So great; plenty of stars and action; can't wait til Red 2 comes out on DVD/blu ray! If you're an action lover, you won't be disappointed unless you like blood and gore! None of that.
Adventure, intrigue, mystery, love, comedy...all you could want in one movie !!  Just went out to see RED 2 and enjoyed that movie just as much as the first !!
Very funny, good action.  Helen Mirren is a hoot, and very funny in this movie.  Really appreciate the always great Bruce Willis.
I didn't like it because I thought most of it was not believeable.  The story was too far fetched even though it was fiction the story line was way out there.

This was a truly entertaining movie with a wonderful cast of characters!  I can't wait to see RED 2 - if it is half as entertaining it will be a good time! I especially loved all the "old timers" in it - a great blending of characters!  The story line didn't need to be believable for it to be fun to watch and I liked that most of the main characters survived to fight another day!
Hilarious and brutal, with two doses of snark added in. Malkovich made me howl. After this week in politics, I'm betting Hollywood got this one right.

I liked Red2 better.  I watched Red afterward, and enjoyed it--I was laughing out loud at several points.  If you like Red2 then RED is definitely worth a viewing, so you won't feel like you've missed anything.
The laughs don't die off in this action film.  It isn't a deep film, but I crack up every time I watch it.
One of the best movies I've beer seen! Me and my husband can't wait to get red 2 ! Cause if it's like red then wow! Lol
I tried for over an hour to stream this movie.  We just finished one, so it's not my connection.  This was a complete waste of money.
one of the best movies i have seen hope number two is just as good looking to adde to my collection
this was a action packed suspenseful movie. I enjoyed it very much. Will suggest this to my friends & family.
Just one of the stupidest movies I ever watched. Can Hollywood get any worse? CIA, "Mother Russia", Good guys, Bad guys, Shooting, Explosions
The film wouldn't play. It did succeed in locking up my roku box. I was able to restore service by unplugging the power and the source feed. I'm now going to try and get my rental fee back.
Really, with these actors, no words are really needed. It looked like they were having a lot of fun making this as well.
I gave this as a gift to my niece, she enjoyed it, and it was an addition to her collection.

John Malkovich is hysterical as the paranoid who actually is being chased by spies.  Helen Miren is the tough broad.  Bruce Willis is Bruce Willis, Morgan Freeman is always a pleasure to watch and Mary-Louise Parker is excellent as the innocent but stalwart love interest unwittingly sucked into a diabolical plot by sinister forces.  Funny and fun.

Lots of action, a nice romance, a bit of humor, and some of the great actors that you've enjoyed in other movies in the past.

I will definitely see the sequel.

This movie is a great mix of comedy and action.  I love Bruce Willis.  His acting just gets better with age.  Mary Louise Parker plays her stereotypical self hut it works well in this movie.  I am antipating Red 2.
I liked this movie.  I won't rave about it, but it was still entertaining.  The comedic interaction across the all the characters was solid, and the action was great.

With a cast like this you're bound to get some good action. There are more stars besides the ones who are listed on the front, too. The plot's engaging enough for them to have made a sequel from the surviving members of this cast, who I won't name to spoil the plot.
This is a fun and great movie, loved it!  Going to buy red 2 also!  Lots of fun and laughs!
My stars and garters there are a lot of good actors in the here movie.  All plausible.  All fun.  A real treat and well, I am glad they did a RED two.
this story line belongs in a nut house.worst movie have ever viewed totally fantasy land. should be sent to the trash pile.and copies burned at the stake. totally garbage.
No deep philosophical meaning just a fast paced entertaining movie.  Yes some violence, but it won't cause any nausea or revulsion.

What a great cast and what a wonderful story line.  John Malkovich's character is wonderfully eccentric. Of course, Bruce Willis ends up being the hero as he should.  I would really recommend this movie and then watch Red2.
This DVD is a Region 1 area  disc & will not play in Austrialia/ New Zealand Region 4 area disc players. Unless to me.

Typical hollywood action offering.  A little more thought out on the plot than most.
Enjoyed the flick, rental was reasonable

It is well written clever and has wonderful actors!  I've never seen a movie with better casting.  It terrific to see a movie with all the major roles went to people 50 - 70.  They played their roles great.  Helen Mirren shows 68 can still be athletic, on the ball and sexy as all heck!
Excellent movie that kept my husband and I either laughing or on the edge of our couch nearly the entire time. Great stay at home date night movie.

I had heard about RED for a while but never got the chance to watch it at the cinema ( I love watching my movies in the Cinema, you can't beat the experience) anyway while going through a list of movies on Amazon wifey saw RED and as it stared Bruce Willis and Morgan Freeman, she knew it would be good action. To cut a long story short, we rented it and totally enjoyed it, it had good action as well as suspense, can't wait to watch part 2.
Almost as good as a Tarantino or Cohen Brothers flick. How did I miss this one at the theaters? Extremely entertaining.
Lots of things exploding with deadpan comic overtones.  No bad language.  Wife also enjoyed it, which is why I gave it a high rating!  Not too many movies that she and I enjoyed watching equally.
Typical , but , some  really  funny  parts.  The  special  effects  make  it  totally  unbelievable, but , the  acting  helps  to  carry  it  thru.

I can't say too much about this spy comedy without ruining the story for you. An all-star cast led by, Willis, Malkovich, Freeman and others will have you laughing so hard you'll have to watch it again just to watch the parts you missed while laughing so hard. The film was a big hit and gave way to a sequel even funnier than this one was. Buy them both, you'll love them. Malkovich is especially a riot to watch in a comedy roll if you've only seen his dramatic performances.
Awesome! Good Action, funny, and very entertaining. Finally a movie that I can enjoy and have given as a gift to many people. No one has told me that they didn't love it
Love the actors in this one.  Bruce always plays an over the top kind of super hero but this one was a little more believable.  Loved that it was also funny.

It took over an hour to stream 2 mins of the movie.  I don't know what the problem was, but I purchased it through my Apple TV subscription and I was able to steam it live.  Of course that cost $4.99.  I guess you get what you pay for.

Red is a belly laugh a minute and I cant believe they got away with that. The idiot that critiqued as a slow geriatric grind should be fired and not allowed to critique movies any longer. The action was fun and out there and the actors held up there end quite well so sit back and enjoy. Your never to old to kill the bad guys.

We love RED. The cast is amazing and is so funny. We laughed the whole time.
It's a great movie to watch with friends.
A very big waste of time.  With a great cast but no real story.  Starts well but soon becomes a low budget disappointment

I thought the movie moved at a good pace.  Unfortunately, there are no nude Helen Mirren scenes  (losing one star).  Morgan Freeman has a small part in the movie.  Watch the end credits and notice ALL the people assigned to Freeman  (makeup for Mr. Freeman, etc).  Some actors do not know how bad real people have it.
I absolutely love this movie!! Great stars and great acting. Funny funny funny. Cant wait to get part 2. EXICITING!!!!!!!
Love it! Very funny, and entertaining. Everyone in the cast is superb and the storyline is unique. We enjoyed it!

Well, this is a yarn from which Hollywood seems able to spin endless stories... Dude does bad things in Guatemala (What, not China or Russia?! Oh yeah, we never attacked them..) And as he becomes vice President, old colleagues from Guatemala start being popped off. Enter our bunch of gnarled old wood. They won't stand for it, ergo - mayhem ensues. Malkovich is fun as the paranoid with a drug-fried brain, Bruce is.. well.. Bruce.. Morgan Freeman is .. well... Morgan Freeman. Mary-Louise Parker is no spring-chicken anymore, but her romance with 89 year old Willis still stretches credibility and becomes alittle silly. I like her though! The Crowning glory, as always, is Helen Mirren, who could act circles around all of them, and plays in a by turns big (what dialogue..!) and understated role. This will easily while away an evening for you, and you'll have fun watching it. No lasting impressions, though.
A great movie to watch. Enjoyed it very much and loved everything about it. The movie is funny and very great.
Can the elder humans have fun and save the world or the moment?  The answer is "yes".  Just give them some time and watch this movie with some friends or enemies (your choice).

I really enjoyed the film. It was funny fast paced and well balanced. The plot moved fairly well but I feel like the relationship dynamic suffered a little once things got rolling. Mostly it hit all the right notes and with this kind of cast, you can't go wrong. It has drama, action, romance and conspiracy.

We rented this movie on amazon because we wanted to see the new movie and felt this would be a good way to understand the premise of the Reds 2 movie.  The story was never slow - always moving and interesting.  Yes there is a lot of shooting and some gruesome acts as this is a spy story/action thriller.  It was really good and I would not mind watching it more than once.
Good movie, not too violent with an easy plot to follow.  Would be a good sequel. Looking forward to getting RED II.
This was a great movie that my wife and I thoroughly enjoyed and have replayed it several times.  We  Cannot wait for RED 2!!

My wife and I loved watching this far fetched, goofy, wonderfully put together movie.  The characters are wonderfully portrayed.  Whether you like a good shoot em up with a spy oriented story, or just seeing some great actors/actress working together, you will like this.  Get the popcorn.
Bruce, Helen and the cast just show us that growing older doesn't stop you from what you know how to do!
WE BOUGHT THIS BECAUSE WE LOVE BRUCE WILLIS AND HELEN MIRREN.  THE OTHER STARS AND THE STORY MAKE IT A VERY ENJOYABLE WATCH.
I bought this as a present for a family member, so by the time she opened it and tried to watch and discovered it was defective, the return period has expired.  Bummer.
Star studded!!  Perfect blend of comedy and action!!  Left you wanting more and more!  Can't wait to watch Red 2!!
The wife usually doesn't like shoot'em up movies, but she laughed thru most of this one. Willis is Willis and playing Willis works for him. If you like Willis you'll like this
Bruce Willis never disappoints and this movie is very entertaining.  My husband watched it several times!  Great movie so go watch it!
I enjoyed this movie, the quaility of the Amazon instant video was good, but still a little lacking in the HD quality area, but was still worth a rent.
The movie was fun and fast paced...good laughs and filled with some big-name stars too.  If you like action movies with a bit of humor, this is for you.
Excellent cast, and John Malkovich was hilarious!  Great movie with both action and humor.  It did not disappoint us and looking forward to part 2.
I was entertained most of the movie, great stars taking on roles that don't push the envelope but is entertaining. Will see Red2.

Enjoy the characters and getting the band back together comment by Morgan Freeman who is in everything, if you haven't noticed and probably getting close to the richest man on earth, don't you think?....Bruce Willis does it all and the ageless and feminine yet deadly Helen Mirren...fantastic...have Red 2 on order...hope they make Red 3 as well....
The cast works wonderful together.  John Malkovich is great and Helen Mirren, as always, is absolutely fantastic.  This would make a great TV series if it would keep the movie cast.
Rented this as the reviews for Red2 were good. Otherwise hadn't heard of this movie but it was great. Very funny. Good story.
I got hooked up to this show after i saw once episode. It is very fresh, full of action, suspense, and thriller all at same time.

I liked the preview of the movie and finally had a chance to see it!  I love all the cast members and they were funny.  It was nice to spend a couple of hours watching it, but somehow, I didn't fee like watching it again.
THIS GROUP OF ACTORS MADE THIS BETTER THAN I THOUGHT IT WAS GOING TO BE. THE PREMISE IS USED ALOT
Enjoyed watching this all-star cast.  Continued to make me question who are the enemies and who are the good guys.
Would watch the movie. Looking forward to seeing the next movie. I would recommend this series of movies.  I don't have any more comments.
I love the Blu-ray quality of this movie. The picture is sharp and I love the added features. Highly recommend.
I love movies aimed at us baby boomers.  Plus my favorite actors all in the same movie!  Great rainy day movie.
Entire cast is great. Fun film to watch. Bruce Willis and Mary-Louise Parker have a great chemistry on the screen.
Spoofey and occasionally funny.  I think I purchased it because it was only $1.99.  Like most "dollar movies" it was worth the time.
The actors in this movie are wonderful together.  I enjoy this movie so much I have seen it 4 times.  Can't wait to see the next one.
I loved this movie. Not only was it very entertaining but it wasn't loaded with bad language as many are. I can't wait to see Red 2!

Remember, it is just entertainment and this one is OVER to top in UN-reality. Check your common sense at the proverbial door, buckle up and go for the ride.

I enjoyed it and hopefully I didn't lead you too far astray.
Packed with Action, Adventure, Mystery, Comedy, Love, and all Great Actors! Besides you can never go wrong with Morgan Freeman or Bruce Willis!
What's not to love about a good, old-fashioned, American action flick?  Make it retired, senior adult agents coming out of retirement, and it's all the better!

Probably the very best action comedy ever. The  superb cast is nothing short of excelent. Lots of exciting action, very funny comedy, interesting plot (twists) and lots of action and violence. Never a dull moment. Everyone I've shown this movie to, has gone out and bought it! I'd give it six stars if I could!!
I missed this in the theaters but I caught it on Amazon via Tivo.  I loved this movie and can't wait to see the sequel.

Thoroughly enjoyed a movie without so much cussing in it and I know the troops will enjoy it a lot - even the women.  It was excitement, humor and kept the adrenalin flowing.  Being an older woman made me appreciate it even more as it had message "we may be retired but do not count us down or out and have a lot to offer".
Ok, so they are not spring chickens but these are seasoned actors and the movie is very watchable. Helen Mirren can play anyone!

I rented RED  because I wanted to see Red2, but wanted to see Red first.  To my surprise RED was on one of my premium movie channels.  It did not have Bruce Willis and was about a man whose faithful dog was killed by three young men.  I am surprised that the movies were both named RED.
Typical of these actors, but no surprises and I felt that the script was lacking. It was entertaining, but not outstanding.
This is a great movie. Very funny and action packed.  Great combination of characters. Would recommend this movie to anyone.
This movie was great fun and enjoyable to watch. Loved the characters, actors playing them, the plot, and overall the movie.

Think this was one where all the best parts are in the trailers.
As the plot moved along, it just seemed disjointed, and even though it was a comedy, they seemed too hard to make it believable, and not succeeding at it.

Still good for some laughs.
Saw it when it came out - lots of my favorite actors and actress. Had to add it to my collection. Great humor and action. Looking forward to Red2.
I really enjoyed this movie.  It had action and humor.  I am a Willis fan and this was just an enjoyable movie.  I definitely would recommend this movie.  Great for a date nite.

This movie had me on the edge of my seat, not in suspense, but in surprise at what happens next!  Not your usual action flick; not your usual "old people" doing crazy things.  Clever writing, characterization, and plot.  A new cult series!
Didn't like the movie, couldn't follow the storyline well.  I do like the actors though, which was why I bought it.
I had a good time when I was watching even though this was my second time. Recommend it! Funny and a kind of action.

From the previews in the theater the movie looked like a bunch of tired old actors looking for an easy payday.  After viewing the movie, I have to admit that I liked it much more than I expected.  Give it a try.
Red brings a group of retired spies out of their comfortable golden years and into an adventure that allows this team to use their skills and defeat their foes.
Just a little slow in parts for us. I guess If you have nothing better to do...than go for it :)

I invited an old friend over and we usually cannot decide on a movie because she prefers comedies, while I enjoy action.  This movie had it all!  When we saw the cast, it was a no-brainer; the movie would be good.  It certainly did not disappoint.  We are planning to see Red 2 at the theater this week because we like the first movie so much.
My husband and I both enjoyed watching this movie. Fast paced and fun. These former agents rock!  Bruce Willis is great as usual in this type of movie. Looking forward to seeing Reds 2.

The director must have been salivating when he ended up with this ensemble cast.  All give superb performances.  The story is absurd and far fetched but WORKS!  Give it a rent and will find it well worth it.
Great movie it was nice to see "old men and women" kick some younger peoples booty.  Show is filled with action and humor to go along with it and a moral.

I love this movie. Bruce Willis at his best. I love his love interest - she dreams of having an exciting life so unlike the one she has and then when it drops in her lap, suddenly its not so great. But over time she warms to it and by the end...woops, don't want to spoil it.

John Malkovich is wonderful as Rain Man meets Get Smart, and I think I fell in love with Helen Mirren; even though I saw her years ago as DCI Tenison in Prime Suspect, I never saw her as attractive or even particularly female til now.

Cant wait for RED2.

CAUTION: the DvD won't play in computers; so if thats how you watch movies you'll need to get the movie some other way.
Great action movie with Bruce Willis, Morgan Freeman, John Malkovich, and Helen Mirren. Great storyline about retired CIA operatives, fans of all these great stars will really like it.

This movie is GREAT fun!  Malkovich, Cox, Freeman, Mirren, and Parker are a terrific ensemble with Willis AND Pidgeon, Urban and Dreyfus are great foils.  Good script.  The Baer commentary film is pretty good, too--lots he didn't reveal but that's ok.
The movie is ridiculous, but I still loved it. A bunch of over the hill actors that are my age or older & I laughed my rear-end off.
Movie was excellent acting was great one heck of an entertaining movie. I'm not sure why it would stop every five minutes though to buffer?
This movie was not as action packed as I thought and fun level really low. I have to watch part two now
Husband had seen it and told me how good it was so I watched and he was right. Anxious for Red 2 to come out....

What a surprise! When I watched Red for the first time I thought, "another adventure movie." Was I ever wrong! It's got an excellent cast, is high on adventure, with twists and turns in the plot to get and hold your attention. When the movie ended I thought "Holy Cow!!! And for cats sakes!!! Bruce Willis, John Malkovich, Morgan Freeman and Helen Mirren; how could you go wrong!!

  I'm not a big fan of Bruce Willis, but he's really good in this.  I've always liked Morgan Freeman, but fell in love with him in this role.  Malkovich simply doesn't make a movie in which he is anything less than fantastic and his interplay with every actor in this just plain makes this a movie you don't want to miss.  As for Helen Mirren, there's no female actor who can play any role better and she doesn't let us down here.  This woman's talent is amazing!

  Mary Louise Parker has never made a big impression on me, but she really holds her own with the powerhouses I spoke of above.

  If you want to have fun watching a movie with lots of action, daredevil stunts and a really good script while still managing to not take itself too seriously, I can't recommend "Red" highly enough.
Reds II came out, but my husband and I decided we needed to watch #1 before seeing it.  It was well worth the price.

This movie is cut from the same cloth as "This Means War", "Mr. & Mrs. Smith" or TV's "Burn Notice" so, if you like those, there's a good chance that you'll like this.

This was a really good movie. There was a lot of action and it kept my attention. I couldnt' find this movie on netflix or my paid for view channels. I was about to give up hope and then I decided to try amazon. I also know I can count on amazon for the things I want.
Entertaining with action and humor. Worth a couple bucks when you can't find anything on television. If I had known how good it was I would have watched it sooner.

Suspense, intrigue, and action are not the sole province of the young. These aging spies put James Bond to shame with their ability to divine the nature of the machinations surrounding them and respond with measures to achieve their ultimate goal and not simply escape from the immediate trouble. The characters are a little predictable but entertaining anyway.

First off, I like all the stars in this movie and I wasn't disappointed in the entertainment they provided. I had forgotten I'd seen this movie before but it was still fun to watch again. The violence is no where graphic to the point of being disgusting but you definitely get the point that these people know how to use a weapon. Would recommend to anyone.

This movie is a great compromise for two people wanting to watch a movie when one wants a comedy and the other wants an action.
Fun movie. Nice mindless fun on a weekend night or day when I'm folding clothes  Love the action and the snappy diaglogue.

Probably the surprise hit of the year at the time, it combines Light Humor with Dark, stamps it mark on every spy spoof and blends characters better than many of the "Big Budget" films.  Bruce Willis is perfect, but John Malkovich steals any scene he is in, and plays the paranoid/schizophrenic/pentagon-experiment-gone-wrong to a tee!  Can you help but feel that Helen Mirren and Brian Cox are really spies?  I could go on and on about Morgan Freeman, Richard Dreyfuss and the rest of cast who are either directed to perfection and are enjoying playing together.  Absolutely entertaining in a way most films are not.  A bit violent without being too bloody, or even violent for violence's sake  it is merely the silliness of excess violence that makes it fun.  No one gets hurt in the filming of this movie  except for the competition!  Not quite as silly as the original "Casino Royale" (David Niven, Woody Allen), it manages to entertain to the max.  You might say I could even recommend it...  But don't tell anyone.
Is a great movie, I recommend if you like action and comedy together also was a good price 1.99$ can't bit that

I love all the actors in this movie.  It was great to be able to see them all in ONE movie together.  The action is great.  And they make the out of the ordinary seem as ordinary and nothing special in ones life.
Fun romp through the world of clandestine operations.  With Helen Mirren and John Malkovich, what's not to like?  Morgan Freeman, too!

Nicely surprised by RED - starring Bruce Willis (smirk firmly in place) as Frank Moses, a middle-aged guy in suburbia, living on a pension, who keeps calling the pension office to lie about his monthly checks not arriving because he has a bit of a crush on customer service rep Sarah (Mary-Louise Parker). Sarah is bored and lonely and wanting adventure in her life ... and gets more than she could ever hope for when someone from Frank's past sends a battalion of commando-like assassins to kill him - the bad guys going after Sarah, in turn, as she's been the only person Frank has contacted in some time! Frank, forced to sort of kidnap Sarah just to rescue her, goes on the run, but is soon forced back into his old "line of work" when he has to put together his team of deadly agents from the past - all of them now classified as "RED" (Retired, Extremely Dangerous) - to stay alive and find out just what the hell is going on.

I really enjoyed this film, filled with action and suspense but also humor. John Malkovich, the brilliant Helen Mirren, Morgan Freeman, Karl Urban, and Richard Dreyfuss round out one hell of a supporting cast, and even with a slightly hokey ending this is still an enjoyable romp that provides both thrills and laughs. Hope the sequel works as well!

I ordered this movie for my ROKU player.  From start to finish I counted at least 10 interruptions for movie to "reload".  At least 2x my TV screen went completely blank, only to return after a few seconds.  Very frustrating to say the least.  The movie itself is a very enjoyable one, but the delivery to me was very poor.  I will not be ordering from you any more movies in HD.
Not terrible, but really could be better. Drags on a bit.  Not one I would say you have to go see, but I sat through it without complaint.
This movie has everything. Action, romance, intrigue, more explosions than you know what to do with - AND it's FUNNY! And the blu-ray is great. If you're a fan of action movies, go see this. Now.

The movie was fast paced Just what you would expect from a Bruce Willis movie. Not for ll age groups.

If there was a higher rating available for the truly GREAT movies, Red deserves it!!!! This movie has it all!!!! I can't imagine anyone not liking it!!! I saw some bad reviews, which honestly shocked me, so I read some of them.  Most people are not reviewing the MOVIE itself, they are reviewing the DVD quality, the delivery format and speed....Errrr.  THAT is not rating the MOVIE!!! Take those complaints elsewhere!! This has to be in my top 5 movies of all time....quite possibly number 1.  If you have a sense of humor, a sense of romance, a love for excitement and danger....and IF you are NOT one of THOSE people who critique every single moment, just looking for a flaw, ANY flaw(you KNOW the type); if you just enjoy the movie for what it IS and for what it was MEANT TO BE....you, too, will become a Red fan!!!!

The story line is great, the action doesn't stop, and you will not want it to end!  Just remember, do not mess with us Senior Citizens - we do not play fair!!

Great movie!!!  If you want a laugh with a big side order of laughter, this is your movie!!  Will be adding to my collection!

not quiet what i expected but still all around a good movie that i enjoyed very much, will watch it again

For whatever reason, I've always found Bruce Willis to be at his best when he is playing the droll super-hero.  Such is the case in "Red" and I thought this was one of his better movies of the recent past.  Granted, I say this without having seen a lot of his more current releases.

In this particular case, the movie is a bit slow to develop and you are wondering what's supposed to happen.  Needless to say, as with all action movies, what does take place is not always plausible; and, in this case, as the story develops there are a lot of complexities which are difficult to piece together and which raise a lot of questions which somehow suddenly get answered at the end.  That said, the movie is a fun "jaunt" with a lot of action.  I can't wait for the video release of "Red2".
It was a funny, enjoyable movie.  Bruce Willis was his usual and Helen Mirran was a riot.  We liked it.

I didn't mind the movie, that's a question of individual taste, but my experience with the video service on amazon is no different than others. I absolutely hate that I can't store my own movie, which I pay full freight for, in a native file on my drive for use on projectors, or whatever other medium I chose. I recognize that the regulation is largely driven by the content owners and AMZN has little to do with it, but I feel a bit like someone sold me a dvd but told me that I can only watch it on Sony TV's. In 2013, that's absurd. Lets get it together guys. Until these services become less closed, I'll continue to rip my own DVD's into digital copies that I can enjoy with ease.

That in 2013 RED 2 is being released pretty much sums up my thoughts of this film.  Where the premise is about retired government assassins being hunted down and joining together to protect each other, themselves had me thinking this was going to be some extreme action flick, particularly with Bruce Willis as one of its stars.  Instead it was one of the funnier films I've seen Willis in and his co-stars, all of whom I expect for more dramatic roles, made it even more pleasant:  Helen Mirren (adore her work), Morgan Freeman (plays God often enough, he must be a close friend and still can give us the drama and the laughs he did much earlier in his career), John Malcovich.  The name alone tells you you're going to get a great performance from a great actor.  Here he plays the "off" a little character, again, but unforgettably.  And refreshing to the cast is Mary-Louise Parker.  Caught up in the adventure by being in the right place at the wrong time.  Sure, there's action, but there's award winners "playing" as much as working and I found the film a complete delight.  I look forward to actually seeing its sequel, and I'm not a huge fan of sequels (exception may be the Willis Die Hard series of films).
A good, fast paced movie that is a little serious and a lot funny!  I recommend it to anyone.  Enjoy

The movie is great. We saw Red 2 and decided we should watch the first one second(don't recommend that order), but we enjoyed both. My problem was with the download. First off we decided to watch it one evening and find out the download is going to take 6 hours to download to our Tivo. After that downer we went on with the download and chose to watch it the following evening. An hour and a half into the movie, it stalls out and we can't finish the thing! Very disturbing! I call Amazon and they tell me to reset router and Tivo and try a new download. He refunds the cost of the 1st download and I still have to pay for the 2nd. He says it should take around an hour for the download. After waiting an hour we gave up and went to bed, so finally the following evening we get to finish the movie three days in. I gave the movie 5 stars because it is a good movie, love the cast, but amazon needs to work on the downloading process. I think I'll stick to Netflix.

We saw this movie in preparation to see "RED 2" at the theater. What a pleasant surprise! Action and comedy intelligently mixed! An entertaining tale that shows retired  professional assassins not only coping with life-and-death situations but also personal relationships and their struggle to become "ordinary" after a lifetime of routinely and casually dispatching bad guys. Bruce Willis plays an average Joe who just happens to have his hit-man past catch up to him suddenly and violently. Mary-Louise Parker plays his uninitiated love interest who is initially terrified but eventually turned-on by all the intrigue. In order to survive, Willis needs to enlist the aide of old cronies Morgan Freeman, John Malkovitch, and Helen Mirren all of whom give solid performances. One of the funnier action/comedies of recent years (and the sequel was even BETTER).
Clever lines, intricate revenge theme, big guns and John Malcovich steals every scene he is in. Oh  and the good guys win. What could go wrong with that?
What Red lacks in plot and storyline is made up in great acting.  My husband and I were pleasantly surprised at how much we enjoyed it.
Started out pretty funny, but kinda lost it's way. Enjoyable film, but nothing great. All good actors, though. Love ML Parker.

The movie is perfectly cast!  What a pleasure to watch Helen Miren be a hired gun!  We watched it twice!  Well cast, well written and somewhat different from the usual Bruce movie in that the comedy goes very well with the killing!
Humorous, decent performances from a fine collection of actors - nothing too deep or thought provoking.  Good rental. Not one for the vault but certainly entertaining.
Between the veteran cast and a quirky/witty adventure script, you cannot go wrong with this movie!! I enjoyed it even more the second time...so many little moments not caught the first time.
It is a spoof and its good fun and great cast.  He's Bruce all the way with his it in this one.
A no brainer, requires no thought, makes you laugh, an enjoyable film.  Make sure to follow up with RED II which I though was funnier.

There is something to be said for "Been there, done that."  Lots of training and millions of dollars prepared many operatives for extreme field duty and not for nothing.  Our love of the Cold War and days of the "real" spies don't have to be over.  They can still kick some tail.  Sit back and remember how it used to be done.  In a word....fun!

the plot was thin and outrageous but what else do you expect from a bang bang shoot em up with Bruce Willis It was exactly what I like to see in this type of movie a few car chases lots of explosions. If you like the diehard series you will love this.

Didn't get to see it but I got charged for it. I keep getting "Insufficient Bandwidth" errors. Amazon says its me but I have an 8 Meg connection with no one else on it. Not likely.  Apple TV and NetFlix both work flawlessly.

I would suggest a must watch.

Far from art house, but right in the zone for mixed audiences.  The actors appeared to have as much fun making the movie as we had watching it.  Nothing serious here, just crazy silly fun that left big smiles and a yearn for more.  Which is good since the sequel is already out.  Saturday night popcorn movie with no redeeming message, just good entertainment with lots of bang bang and silly antics wrapped nicely in some great, and some not so great actors.
Action Packed and hilarious. I didn't think that my wife would like it but even she thought it was good.

I have to admit, I didn't see this movie until I watched Red2.  I LOVED Red2 and my sister told me about Red.  I got a copy and fell in love with the movie!  Talk about action and excitement! I love the "mature" actors!  When Richard Dryfess appeared I just about died laughing!  What a suprise!  All I can say is, there's life in us old dogs afterall!  All these "retired" agents (Retired and Extremely Dangerous-RED) showing that they still got the stuff.  I don't want to give away the story, so I'll just say that if you like a good, action-filled movie without a lot of "F" words and gore, you'll probably love this movie.  The action doesn't stop from the time Ben's Christmas decorations get taken out until the final "chase" scene with John Malkovich (wearing a dress) riding in a handcart pushed by Bruce Willis!  A fun, lively, action-filled movie. Enjoy!
this is a comedic action movie, the main characters are entertaining and the dialogue witty...a kick back, eat some popcorn, get-away movie.

This film was very fun to watch, it catches you and brings you in on the action!

Funny, decent story-line, great actors and actresses, and a decent amount of action!

A group of retired agents on the loose, who would've thought that older folks can do what these R.E.D. folks can do...

~ Willie
Loved it. Yht cast was great and worked well. Can not wait for RED 2!!!! Watched it several times. Wow!
I've watched this movie several times. Bruce Willis is fantastic, as usual. He totally fits his character in this one. Love the story line even though I'm not an action movie fan.
The movie was good but not the best movie. My mom and i watched this Friday afternoon because we saw thee second one on Saturday.

Great fun and a bit frighteningly believable
U cannot mandate # of words; why would u?.
#'s discourage creativity
Who
This is a good movie if you don't want too much reality. If you're a picky person about that then you won't like this movie . It is just a fun movie.
Great movie. cant wait to see part 2 , hope its a good as the first one. would recommend it

not to mention John Malcovich too.  This is a spectacular adventure suspense thriller that is both funny and entertaining
A honestly great movie I recommend that doesn't have to have swearing to make it good.

Don't understand why some people want every movie they watch to be grand literature or Oscar winning performances.  Red, and it's sequel, are just fun entertainment . . . easy light comedy and a little action thrown in for good measure.  O.K. a lot of action.  Enjoy.
Very good, liked the cast and i thought it was funny. Would definitely recommend this movie and can't wait for Red 2
After I saw this film, I immediately the next day in fact, went to See Red 2.  Both films were very entertaining.
It kept me awake and it had some good moments to it. I would recommend it to anyone. Good cast and worth the money.

Good intro to "Red 2".  Having seen it once before it jogged my memory.
Recommended to anyone going to see "Red 2".

How could this movie go wrong with this lineup of actors?  My only complaint is the gender thing.  Only one role for an actress over 50, and lots of old geezers.  And why does Bruce Willis have to score with a granddaughter image?  Same old stuff--but at least they had ONE experienced woman role.  Other than that, the movie was great.
We watched the movie just before we went to see Red 2. A lot of fun. I recommend this movie
This product arrived on time and in good shape. The DVD played well and the movie is very entertaining. Great preparation for the upcoming "RED 2."
Gotta love Bruce Willis and all the gang. They make great group of actors. This is a action movie & yet funny!

Story was excellent.

Problem was in downloading it. Every 5 minutes it had to reload additional material. Do not have the download problem with Netflix and usually do not with Amazon--just with this particular rental.

I told my husband several years ago that I had seen this at a cousin's house and it was action with some good fun.  He grunted. Then someone told him about the new one and he was interested in that so I rented this in case the new one is a sequel. Since it was my 2nd time, I gave it a 4.  My husband got a charge out of it for action scenes and gags but for this review he said 4 also. His reasoning:  It did not keep you completely on the edge of your seat the whole time and it was not quite as funny as some Bruce Willis flicks he has seen.  Still, it was entertaining without a lot of swearing and WOW! No unwanted sex scenes!  We just do not care for that sort of thing so in that department I would have to give it a 5 for writing a plot not dependent on vulgar language and crass scenes.
I loved this when it first came out and I had to see it again before going to see RED 2.
Good action comedy, definitely a cheesy plot line, but very entertaining. Good image quality on the streaming side with this rental.
Parody disguised as adventure and travelogue. Violent but cartoony very quickly. Especially enjoyed Bruce Willis and Helen Mirren in their roles as 'reluctantly' unretired agents.
Fun filled action packed. LOVED IT! I'm glad I signed up for Amazon Prime because it was not on Netflix.
It is very satisfying to see "older" actors cast in action roles.  This troupe added a bit of love interest and humor to the overall feeling of the movie.

The initial premise is an interesting idea, the acting is quite good and there are no dull moments.
However, there are huge gaping holes in the storyline.  Just to give one away:  Bruce Willis, a retired CIA agent lives in a residential neighborhood and is on friendly terms with his closeby neighbors.  When his name comes up on a secret list for elimination, the bad guys attack in the middle of the night with a full range of assault weapons, destroy his home and yet, not one peep or even a light from any other homes on the block!
If you're just wanting 2 hours of adventure, without having to think about it ever again, this may be just the thing for you.
Honestly with an all star cast I expected a bit more from this movie - for $3 it was OK however I will not be paying any more than that to see the next one!
This was a fun movie, light, with lots of action.  Now I'm ready to see red 2. 3 more words
Since I wanted to see Red 2, I thought I should see this one first. It had action, humor and romance.
If you enjoy action movies with good CGI you will like this movie.  The dialog is halarious and a very good cast.
This movie is very enjoyable; I would recommend everyone should watch it at least once if they enjoy fast action movies.

With a well-fleshed, slightly comedic script, you pretty much can't lose with actors the like of Willis, Freeman, Malkovich, and Mirren.  Pop the corn, get a refreshing adult beverage, put your feet up and just enjoy this movie.  It's a romp.
Have never been a fan of Bruce Willis but he along with the rest of the cast did a great job and made watching this movie very enjoyable.

i liked the movie alot but i could barely hear the actors speaking the music was so
insanely loud...please fix the sound... red imho was better than red 2
Great movie. Had fun watching it. Action, comedy and fast pace. Will watch it again and the sequel. Rent it
This is a wonderful ensemble piece with a clutch of total professionals having a whole bunch of fun doing this film. It makes it worth watching.
This movie was fun to watch. It was like a spoof on Bond or serious action movies and Willis is always fun to watch.
very well done. Lots of action, a great cast that works very well together. This is a must see movie.
Watched this on a whim. It was nice for a rainy weekend afternoon. Nothing you haven't seen before. No great performances. Good pacing and action.

Very slow moving and the characters were not interesting.  After deciding that Red 2 was not worth the price of admission  and popcorn at a theater, we thought the original might' be better but if that is true, Red 2 must be really bad.
It's classic Bruce!!  You have to love it!!  DC comics are the greatest at this type of adventure.  Watch and enjoy.
I love this movie, we watch it every chance we get and we can't wait to see part 2. Our teenage kids love this movie too!!!
one of the best movies Ive seen in a long time. Loved Bruce Willis and John Malcovich also Helen Mirren. Cant wait to see Red2

This was a great movie.  I didn't know about it until Red 2 came out.  We liked Red 2 and took a chance on Red.  I highly recommend seeing it.  If you like high action scenes with a decent story line, this is for you.  Bruce Willis and John Malkovich are a great pair and really make a great team.  It was certainly worth the $1.99!

Great get a way film.
Never know what's next and just when you think you know what's coming..WHAM! MORE SURPRISES.
I love it when the bad guys get their just desserts in the end. Personally, I am over 60, so I can relate.
A fun movie to watch. Great line-up of popular, talented actors. I can't wait to watch Red 2! Solid movie overall.
Great movie-- Very funny. Great interactions between characters. The plot was built so accommodate the funny interactions. Set us up for RED2.
Great action movie with just enough humor from talented actors! Enjoyed the characters and look forward to seeing RED 2!
Was great to see a fun action packed movie that didn't take itself too seriously. Good star power and I look forward to RED 2
Definitely worth the watch. Plenty of laughs, and action. Enjoyed the contrast of good sarcasm, and explosions. Going top see the sequel at the theater tomorrow night.
I loved this movie except for the ending it was really poorly written, I would have liked a better ending. Other than that I thought it was great!
I was eagerly waiting for Red 2 to come out, and heard that Red was terrific. It is indeed! I'm glad I bought it, I know I'll watch it again.
I love movies with suspense, excitement, a twisted story, action, explosions, humor, AND a love story!  This has it all!
I went to the theatre to see Red 2 but never saw the first. I truly enjoyed the movie, but liked the sequel better. Watching the original gave me history on the characters in Red 2
Awesome fun action film and story line with great character development too. I can't wait to see the second film now.
Rented it to prepare to see RED2 at the cinema. Thought there would be more laughs. The actors are good, but I don't think I would watch again, or go to see RED2.
I love this movie and wanted to add it to my movie library.  So I give this movie five stars.
Fun action flick without all the special effects overload that is found in most movies today.  Lots of twists and jokes
The actors are great at doing their thing in a nonchalant way.  I love action movies & these stars.  I can't wait for the next one.
Did you like pulp fiction? Same genre. This crossed the generational divide. Required viewing before Red 2, then you can see it again.
I enjoyed the whole movie, it has a great cast I can not wait to see red 2 as soon as i can
It was full of the usual action, with a lot of fun spoof! Looked like the actors were having fun! I wanted to see it in case I saw Red 2 - I chose not to see the sequel...

The cast in Red really make it what it is.
The plot is one we've seen before however the combination of
wit and slapstick humor (especially around John Malkovich) is wonderful!

There are a few surprises that make this easy to sit through to the end
and the chemistry between the actors makes for a rare feel good action flick!
I enjoyed "Red".  Bruce Wills and his friends were great, very action pack, and the good guys wins.  Fun to watch.
I laughed a lot and the storing was interesting, some nice action too.  The main actors were excellent.  I'm looking forward to Red 2.
Very funny and very well done.  A good blend of humor, action, and special effects.  Also love Red 2 - I think it's a great sequel.

I would definitely recommend this film for pure entertainment, but the plot was pretty predictable and some of the scenes were just way too far-fetched. But, you can beet Bruce Willis and Morgan Freeman.

Found it entertaining, but nothing more.  I am fan of all of the actors but the script lacked something.  I like the usual comic relief to break the high tension, but the tension was never that real for me.
I was very curious about this movie after seeing many commericals on Red 2.  I truly enjoyed this movie and now look forward to seeing Red 2

The movie was a fine action movie, but Amazon's streaming delivery of this movie in SD format was the worst I have experienced in years.  It came in blocky, stuttering, skipping and several times there were pauses in the streaming.  I have not had these issues with movies rented from iTunes, Netflix or Hulu in the past three years.  Amazon needs to work in their streaming video delivery.
Not a fabulous movie but cute and funny. I am a fan of Bruce Willis, Hellen Mirren, and John Malkovich though. You could put those three in any movie and make me smile.

Nice plot,great cast of actors and a decent director creating a set piece for the viewer to look at.worth a recommend.

a very enjoyable film everybody clicks they make the action so realistic their zimmers never once clash such professionals thumbs up for this movie i hope the sequal is as good.
I saw RED2 in the movie house first.  I wish I had seen this one first.  None the less, I enjoyed RED very much.  It explained a number of things I saw in RED2

Price was great, DVD arrived in a week and was in perfect condition. The DVD hadn't come loose, the case hadn't broken and there wasn't a scratch on anything. Very happy with my purchase!! And this movie was great! Very funny!!
I've had more problems lately with the Amazon Prime streaming service. Is anyone else having the same problems? I love the Prime service, but the streaming is jerky and sometimes non-responsive.
Really great movie for anyone. I have already watched in 20 times and still can't get enough of it. Wish I never watched it so I can see it for the first time all over again.
Very enjoyable and looking forward to seeing Red 2!  So glad I was able to view this as an Amazon Prime member!!!
Wish it had a digital download though.  But a worthy movie to add to my collection.  Can't wait to see Red 2.

What a fun movie to watch. I recently found this at my local Library & knew I had to get this in Blu-ray. It has such a good cast too. I am glad they put this out in the 2:40:1 Aspect Ratio. I just enjoy the movies better when you can see the entire screen as the Director intended. Can't really comment on the Audio as I am currently using only my tv speakers. It probably is fine though. The Special Features are: Audio commentary: Deleted & Extended Scenes: {No big deal here} & something called Access Red which sends me back to Audio Commentary. Special Features aren't all that important to me as much as the quality of the movie being watched. The Blu-ray is quite good compared to the picture on my dvd. This movie puts a smile on my face every time I watch it. Glad I got it in Blu-ray.
Funny shoot 'em up with great actors having a GREAT time! Suspect there will be a Red 3 as we just saw 2 and liked it too.
The movie arrived on time and in great condition.  It's a great movie, even for preteens, this purchase allowed us to have a great family movie night.
Enjoyed it and it was comical and full of action. Great to see older actors in this type of film.

It would have been hard for Red to miss on the rating chart for me because there wasn't a major cast member that I don't absolutely enjoy their work and have enjoyed their work.  Every single name I saw during the opening credits was a draw to this movie for me.  Still, the writing was fun, it seemed to flow in an organic manner that allowed easy suspension of disbelief even though there were some truly ridiculous moments that verged on slapstick.
This movie is great! i watched it on tv for the first time and thought i needed to have this
Fun movie, just don't take it too seriously. My teenagers loved it, they are 13 and 14, and it was right up their alley!
Casting was excellent.  Plot was very good.  Action movie while at the same time developing the characters enough for you to have an interest in them personally.  Recommend to anyone.
This movie was nice and funny, good entertainment. I was worth watching, I would recommend it to anyone that wanted a good movie for the night.
Lots of action, decent plot, nice chemistry in the casting. Willis can still carry the right kind of film plot.
Fun movie to watch for mindless entertainment.  Great cast.  I Certainly hope that Reds2 is equally as enjoyable as the first.

The playback quality wasn't up to the usual Amazon quality. The picture was grainy and stopped multiple times during playback. I did a Speedtest.net check on my system afterward as I had never had a problem and my download speed checked fine so it must have been an Amazon problem. It was frustrating with the poor quality but we did get through the movie.
This movie won't change your life, but it is a lot of fun.  A great "Friday Pizza/Movie" Night flic!  (adult fun that is.  very violent.  not for little kids)
Very entertaining video. I look forward to seeing the sequel now that it has come out in theaters this summer.

This film combined a bit of everything I like in a movie: comedy, action with surprises (if somewhat predictable). The cast pulls it off and I love the addition of a female as part of their team. Malkovich is hilarious, Willis is his usual dry self and Helen Mirren an absolute delight!
It's a fun show to watch for a $1.  Very glad I waited until it came out on DVD. enjoy
I like it It is fun but not like you know the best movie ever still better than nothing at all
Loved the action, humor, romance--fun Movie.  The smirk on Bruce WIllis' face and the characters of the others makes this an enjoyable movie
We all had a lot of laughs and in joyed it very much.  I do wish that the movies didn't have so much bad language in them.

This was a great movie.  Unexpected, unique and fun.  Sadly, like with most Amazon VOD, there's no captioning.  This doesn't reflect badly on the movie, of course, but more so about Amazons reluctance to provide a service to the handicapped.
I found this movie very entertaining, it had action and laughter and I loved the actors. I would recommend this movie to anyone.
Im not sure what happened but I was unable to watch the video at all. I could watch any of the ones I previously downloaded. Just wanted to let someone know.
Great movie, action, comedy and drama with great actors. I highly recommend it. Hope that RED2 is just as good.
You have to see this movie especially b/c there is a sequel. I'm young and I love that all the actors are pretty mich 50 and up. It gives me something to look forward to later in life :)
I liked the story line. Action and amusing. I didn't like that Morgan Freedman had to die. I would recommend to a friend to watch!

ACTION MOVIE NO CUSSING? IT CAN BE DONE  GOOD JOB HOLLYWOOD

Lots of Willis' action! Keeps you on the edge of your seat. Good casting and special effects are excellent. Photography was super.
I normally avoid any movie with explosions and violence but a friend said it was good and had humor.  My wife and I watched it and found it to be funny and very entertaining.
Love this movie!  "Old people" ROCK!!!!!!!  Can't wait till the next one comes out.  Enjoy watching experience overcome violence and bravado!
Fun action movie, with a good sense of humor. I would watch it again, and I am looking forward to the sequel.

An earlier version of this script may have been a bit hard-hitting and illuminating as to the US involvement in the dirty wars of South America.  But, it appears, that has all been focus-grouped out of the proceedings.
Bland.  Unfunny.  Almost embarrassing for all involved in the project.
This flick is Quirky and fun, just classic Bruce Willis. Blow stuff up, comedy and violence. Looking forward to part 2!
needed to get brushed up on RED before we went to see RED2 in the theater!  Love being able to watch movies via Amazon!
Bruce Willis, Helen Mirren, Morgan Freeman, what is there not to love? Looking forward to seeing number two this weekend!
I especially liked the characters - not a bunch of steroid stars, but people with experience and talent who carried this through to the great ending.  The perfect lead-in to "Red2."
What a treat! A fantastic crew and a fun story. Malkovich is an absolute lunatic, and I love it! Bruce Willis is the calm one, for a change.
Really enjoyed this movie.  Great plot, great acting and kept my interest throughout the entire movie.  I would recommend this movie.
Suspenseful, lots of action and funny too! A great combination. Helen Mirren does a great job as do they all. I would definitely recommend it to anyone close to retirement and everyone else too.

I watched Red (Part I) so that I could get an understanding of the characters and I'm glad I did as I was able to appreciate the dynamics between them. Bruce Willis and Morgan Freeman were a good team and the overall plot and action scenes were pretty good.
Action for the "Third age"  but still likable. All characters well play by the famous artist,... Waiting for Red 2, coming soon...!
This movie had me both intrigued and laughing at the same time.  Well done!  I am looking forward to watching Red 2

Both my wife and I enjoyed the move.  It was a fun action move and Mary-Louise Parker added a great touch of humor.  The quality of the video was good but the audio wasn't.  It would have been more enjoyable with surround sound.
Lots of action and it's entertaining. The cast is the best thing about the movie - everyone seems to be having a good time.

Take a base of Mission Impossible, where Bruce Willis is Tom Cruise.  But mix it with the comedy of True Lies the whole way through.  Then add a Ocean's Eleven type caper feel throughout (especially the end) and I think you'll have some idea of what this movie watches like.

I loved it, I liked/loved all the above.  Bruce and Morgan, plus the girl is really very likeable (much more so early on, that didn't develop like I wanted it to) and it's as much likeable star power as any of those other movies as well.  A lot of fun.
Entertaining movie with lots of action and humor.  Good shoot 'em up for a night in front of the TV.

Awesome movie...mary louis parker is awesome, so is everyone else..............its just a gr8 gr8 movie...i don't like all bruce willis movies, but this one had that perfect combination of everything.........5*s.
This is a laugh out loud movie! The movie was entertaining from beginning to end! I would watch this movie again!
Awesome kickass movie. Can't wait for #2. This movie is full of awesome kickass stunts and the awesomeness of all the actors.
Actually, I thought I ordered Red 2 bluray instead of Red DVD.  Passed it to a son and will reorder Red 2 BluRay to have both Red and Red 2 in BluRay.

This is a review of the product. The movie itself is one of my favorites blending action and comedy I highly reccomend watching. As for the Blu-Ray, nothing special about the special features you can listen to real CIA agents talking about real life CIA stuff. If you can get it for less then $15 I would say get this over the DVD, but either one brings you a great movie.
Good movie. Funny and good actors. Now to see if I can watch the sequel, Red 2. Would recommend to everyone.
It was okay. I would watch it again on TV, maybe. It was entraining for a cheap movie. Rent was low that is.

This is the 2nd time I've seen RED.  I saw it at the movies and it was great then.  Decided to rent the HD Video and it was like watching a new movie until it got to the end and I then recalled some of the parts.  It was well played, and the characters fit like a glove.  Its good to see some old timers, best the Gen-Xers.  Looking forward to RED 2
Action packed with some comedy from beginning to the end it kept you on the edge of your seat highly recommend
some of these types of movies show the stars so long in the tooth but this one was just fun.  We're looking forward to watchin the sequel.

I love Bruce Willis films. This one totally snuck past me when it hit the theaters. I could not believe the first 5 minutes!!  Holy Cow!!  Who knew??  John Malkovic had the perfect role, too. Eccentric and paranoid, with a very funny twisted mind. Now I can't wait to see the sequel.
It was not as bad@$$ as I was hoping with Bruce Willis and Morgan Freeman. I so don't believe the storyline between the "30yr old" and Bruce's character.
We just watched it and enjoyed the living heck out of it.  Looking forward to the next Red and stocking up on Popcorn.

Ok. It's DC comics which they tell you up front. But Bruce Willis and Morgan Freeman have so much fun mugging for the camera it's a fun romp in shoot em up, blow em up. No brain er, Saturday night fun. Enjoy. Mary-Louise Parker is hilarious...."pizza" through duct tape...Cracked me up.

I enjoy all of Bruce Willis' work. He shined once again in "Red". Good story. Start was a little slow but action packed thrills and laughs come fast and furious.

This one proves that old is not dead. It was great.
I am glad that "Hollywood" is using age appropriate actors for parts instead of going for those much younger and making them look old.

An action movie with enough comedy relief to make it enjoyable.
It had enough comic relief even my wife could watch it.

now this movie is  a good one with comedy twist and some of the actors in it
well worth it on a day you have nothing going this is the movie for you,
and I can't wait till i get red 2 that i already have on order just waiting for release  of it
Lots of plot twists, good character development. Lots of shooting. The ending has a nice twist. looking forward to the sequel
Good movie with good action and characters.  Nothing great, but put together a fun movie to watch for everyone 10+.
Great escape from the current movie trends of vampires, foul mouthed so called comedies, and borderline  and sometimes "in your face" vulgarity served on a regular basis!
A good summer movie, good fight scene and shoot 'en ups. Fun to watch. I would recommend it for a saturday afternoon.
Love this movie, it was hilarious!! I would recommend it to all my friends. Is a must watch movie. Lol
Old retired people rule based on life experiences & knowledge.  Must see this movie first before watching the sequal, Red 2.
Clean, family movie with great humor. A must own movie that is great for family night or even a date night with the spouse :)
Can't wait to see the sequel. All the stars were super, lots of action and funny at the same time.
On a whim I decided to watch this movie because I'd seen it around for awhile. It was so much better than what I thought now I can't wait to see Red 2.
It has a great actors and it is really great comedy/action movie. I hope that with RED 2 they will keep it in the same mood.
This movie was awesome. It had great stars great action and red two was even better. Would recommend both movies to anyone
The movie was funny and had lots of action.  It's a good movie for couples of a certain age. We enjoyed it.
parts of this movies are hilarious but being that I'm a Malkovich fan I loved it. Can't wait to see Red2

This is still one of my favorites to watch. Absolutely love Mary Louise Parker in this movie, her and Bruce have great chemistry. Helen Mirren is amazing in this movie. Its good for laughs and action.
Actually went and saw Red 2 first and then rent Red loved them both. Highly recommend both movies -see both.
Just what I needed for a night of entertainment at home!  Fun to see some of the older actors I grew up watching!
Everyone's favorite bunch of oldies but goodies playing a lot of action scenes with humor to burn. A nice escape movie worth watching. 4 of 5 stars mostly cause these guys can still do a movie...
It's always good to see Bruce....great play up of retirees. I can't wait to see Red2.  This is a very good flick.
While Red was full of A-list stars and action, it some how missed the mark on being a really great action comedy. A confusing plot and a couple of lulls throughout the movie left it a little flat!!!
Red HD, I really enjoy it. I'm not one for shooter up movies, but this one was sooooo good, funny and love all the ACTORS can't wait to see Red 2 :)
Great acting, funny, love the characters and the plot.  Suitable for older kids/teenagers and adults.  Yes, I recommend watching this movie and be sure to watch it before you see Red 2.
I rarely watch movies more than once, but I would watch this one again! Humorous, intelligent and action-packed. (Just forget the age difference and enjoy the movie! He doesn't look old anyway! lol)
GREAT movie!!  Very pleased.  I'd watch it again.  Easy to rent and view.  Thanks, Amazon.  Enjoyed the second one too!
Action packed and hilarious! One of the best DC comic based movies I've ever seem. You will not be disappointed by this film. Looking forward to the sequel.
This movie lived up to all the previews for me. I really enjoyed it and found it to be really funny.
After ordering it when i tried downloading it said unavaliable please try later.  I tried later and it said the same thing.  I never got to see the movie.
I love the actors, there weren't to many egos to deal with. Im a big Helen Mirren fan so it was good to see her in this role. Unexpected action film, great actors, and good story.
Bruce and action always go together, we watched RED2 first then had to see the first one. Wish we had seen them in order.

Good ensemble effort for the AARP crowd. Bruce Willis and John Malkovich play their usual roles (Willis: tough guy with a heart of gold, Malkovich: crazy lunatic), but some step way out of character (Helen Mirren: stone cold killer).
excellent movie  the second  Red 2 is excellent to  I would buy number 2 it worth the money  Bruce Willis  he rocks I love Bruce Willis move are the best
The movie begins some what slow, but as it takes off it becomes more funny, and lively. If you are into comedy and action I recomend this movie.
Good movie worth watching.  Contains all the elements in a fun, exciting, and humorous movie.  Good for the entire family.
This is a great movie for all ages of adults but especially good to see heroes that are older than 30.  Helen Mirren is the highlight of the movie!
Wonderful cast and great suspense.  Surprise ending after that car chase, was a classic.  OK, now I am ready for Red 2.

Disappointing after reading so many positive reviews - I unfortunately, given the glowing review went ahead and purchased this 'dog' -- okay, that might be a bit harsh but I did expect more out of this 'stellar cast' -- no - no no! Rent if you must  but be for warned it;s a big yawn.

We were going to see the sequel but hadn't seen the first one yet.  Our son said we wouldn't be able to follow the second one without seeing the first.  We had no idea what the movie is about--only the actors/actresses who are in it.  This movie was very funny and made us laugh out loud.  We highly recommend seeing this movie!
Great for a night of entertainment. Cast is awesome and it's a lot of fun. Grab some popcorn and enjoy!
Definitely watch this one! It's perfect! The casting, the action, the romance! I definitely recommend this movie! You'll love it!

Could you get a better cast with better chemistry.  Malkovich steals the show with his insanity.  Helen Mirren delivers again.  And, Bruce Willis is his steady self.  It was what we expected & weren't let down
I enjoyed this movie from beginning to end. I expected it to be "too over the top" but it was not. Great stuff!

The movie is funny, action-packed, and exactly what you expect for Bruce Willis shoot them up.
My rental was exactly what I was looking for, and so I give this movie five stars.
