Okay, in my opinion, Malkovich absolutely steals this movie.  He's so crazy and so in character throughout...both hilarious and a little melancholy.  Just awesome.  Lots of action, lots of humor, some cool effects (check out the Mythbusters where they try to recreate the scene in the tractor trailer yard) and a whole bunch of spies.  What's not to love!  From start to finish, I think the story was very well-crafted and just a whole lotta fun.

With the sequel getting ready to be released I wanted to check this movie out.  I'm glad I did, it has a perfect combonation of action, comedy, story and a perfect cast.  You rarely come across a movie with these elements and they actually pull it off, in this case it's perfection.  If you have not had the chance to see this movie, there is no better time, with the great price from Amazon and the second movie right around the corner, this is a must see movie.

Who knew a flick about a group of old f*rts going rogue and kicking some serious arse could be so much darn fun?  I stumbled across RED recently while channel surfing, and before I knew it, I was watching intently, a fixed grin on my mug.  When a group of former CIA ops reunites to take on a federal government bent on taking them out for knowing too much, with the Vice President himself (Julian McMahon) and an international weapons dealer (Richard Dreyfuss) pulling the strings, you've got a recipe for shoot-'em-up fun.  And the group of senior former spies?  Bruce Willis, Morgan Freeman, John Malkovich, and Helen Mirren (with a dazzling Mary-Louise Parker thrown in as love interest for Willis's character).  To watch this ensemble go to work--especially Mirren packing a machine gun--you can't help but love it, and have grand fun watching.

Yet RED is more than violence and action-packed thrills; this movie has a razor sharp, never-ending comedic edge.  To watch Malkovich muck it up with an array of unreal weapons is sheer bliss; and the character actor Brian Cox adds his own brand of humor to the mix playing a former KGB adversary who is madly in love with the Mirren character.  The cast just meshes, and you can tell they had as much fun making RED as the viewer has watching RED.  It comes as no surprise this film spawned a sequel currently making the theatrical rounds; if one can have this much fun watching a group of seniors take no prisoners, then the sky's the limit when it comes to keeping the action coming as the RED franchise rolls merrily along.
--D. Mikels, Esq.
It was recommended by visiting relatives and it was well worth it! Just a fun, fun flick. You can tell the actors had a great time making it and it carried through the screen.
HOWEVER, I WAS DISAPPOINTED WITH MY SOUND RECEPTION, DON'T KNOW WHY BUT THE SOUND WAS WAY TOO MUCH BASE.  ENJOYED THE MOVIE AND RECOMMEND IT. A LOT OF STARS PERFORM IN THEIR GREAT STYLE.

A great man once said, regarding art, " The work must never show, All great art appears effortless, this applies to visual and performance art." Red is a perfect example, the mastery of the art of acting in this film is sublime! What fun to witness the great performances by each and every member of this STAR cast. However they had a little help, with equally masterful direction, writing, cinematography,special effects and I think all the way to the catering. Every aspect of this film looks like it was as much fun for them as it is for us. I rent movies first to see if they are films I will want to watch often, well Red is on my buy list now! So save the renal and buy Red, you will be watching it ...often.

this is a fun movie  with great action and memorable characters.

The movie was just OK, but the fact that it kept stopping and reloading was annoying. We did not expect to have to deal with this.

Red (a.k.a. Retired Extremely Dangerous) is like the Expendables with even older people, adding more comedy, and not being as fun.  Like the Expendables Red brings in many famous actors like Bruce Willis, John Malkovich, Morgan Freeman, Helen Mirren, Brian Cox, etc. and they embark on a crazy adventure together.  In the film these individuals are retired CIA agents.  However, because of the CIA hunting them down they are forced out of retirement and kick ass once again.  It is an awesome concept (especially with such big names), but one that does not live up to what it could have been.

First off the entire story is very basic and not deep or engaging at all.  A simple story can work if I am entertained, and in this case I wasn't really.  The action scenes are nothing to run home about.  They were alright, but I have seen much better in countless action films like Expendables and Expendables 2.  The villain played by Richard Dreyfuss is lame as well.  He is very basic and has no depth what-so ever.  Plus he gets defeated way too easily.  A big problem with the film is that the final action scene is extremely anticlimactic.  The heroes beat the villain without much of a hitch.

The characters are hit or miss for me.  Morgan Freeman, John Malkovich, Helen Mirren, and Brian Cox are a lot of fun in the film.  Bruce Willis does a good job performance wise, but I found his character to be bland compared to most of the rest of the main cast.  Carl Urban's character I did not really care for either.  He is presented as a rival for Bruce Willis but comes off as more of a nuisance.

Sarah Ross, who played on the show Weeds, I did not like at all.  She plays Bruce Willis's love interest and the token damsel in distress.  I found her useless and very annoying.  In terms of the comedy her jokes were the weakest and did nothing for me.  She was really only in the film to appeal to a demographic.  She should have been left out and focused on the main group kicking ass.

Overall, Red is a mediocre action film at best.  Some of the characters are a lot of fun.  However, other characters were annoying like Sarah Ross and Richard Dreyfuss's character.  Plus you have an uninteresting story, bland villains, and mediocre action scenes.  I know that this is based on a comic.  I do not know if this is how the comic was because I have not read it.  If you want a good action movie with big name actors watch the Expendables.
RED uses classic actors to produce a wonderful satire on government powers, retirement and aging global secret service agents. Such good acting and fast moving plot.

Fantastic action by some fine actors.  It moves with wild action scenes and funny lines as only Bruce and his fellow actors

can do.  I am sure that the actors had as much fun doing this movie as I did watching it.
Great movie with lots of action and humor and a great cast! Can't wait to see Red2 when it comes out!

Wonderful movie with great pacing.  There's always action filled with bits of comedy which gives great movement in the story.  Great cast.

A great cast, a good plot and movie that actually makes sense.

This is a movie you will want to watch a second time. I have seen it 3 times and still enjoy it.
I had to watch it again as the 2nd is coming soon. Love it. Recommend to everyone who likes funny!
This is not a great movie, but it is a great deal of fun to watch.  Actors are all likeable and the story moves along.

With a cast like this, this movie should be wonderful! It's a pile of so many of my favorite actors. But it was simply boring. The plot made little sense, the relationships were barely developed, even the action sequences were less-than-active (except for a couple, and those were so fiercely violent and not in keeping with the movie they weren't fun.) We suffered through the whole thing, but knew after about the first half-hour we should really have moved on.
This movie is a typical Bruce Willis action movie.  Lots of thrills, action and laughs.  Love this guy and all of his movies.  Very entertaining.

I loved the cast and Mary-Louise Parker did a fantastic job. It's fairly cookie cutter. Girl leading boring life yearns for adventure, meets boy with a dangerous past, they fight for their lives together.... I like those movies. Good action, great comedy, a little love story, great movie.
Really enjoyed this movie.  Very funny movie and a great group of actors.  i Cant wait to see RED 2.

Did not get a chance to see this when it was at the theater but wanted to see it before Red 2 came out.  Amazon Instant Video was a great way to catch up.  This is a classic spy spoof with just enough action to make it an action movie and just enough comedy to make it fun.
This movie went by fast, there was a lot of action, humor and yes a love story thrown in there too..  I enjoyed it from beginning to end
funny and lots of action, whole fam loved it!  Can't wait for sequel.  Awesome cast that was loaded with great actors
Interesting plot, and some good action also. It keeps you guessing! Now let's see what Red 2 is all about.
We were not disappointed, as usual Bruce Willis delivered lots of action with his unique sense of humor surrounded by an exceptional cast. Looking forward to Red II.
Did not expect too much. But this is really a fun movie.  Great acting all around. John Malkovich steals the show. (my personal favorite is Brian Cox)  Now I have to watch the sequel!  Recommended.
Couldn't find any way to re-download or get help without calling, so flushed the $2.99 and went on with our evening

Good Movie, the acting and wonderful old actors seemed to really be enjoying themselves.  The dialogue was never dry, fun to listen too. I gave it 4 stars because at the end it drug for about 10 minutes, like they were not sure how to end the movie.  But beside that it is worth watching.
I expected better acting from these professionals. They seemed to be simply reciting their lines with minimal effort to really act the parts.

Loved the cast!  A little violent, but was softened a bit with the comedic relief.  Started a little slow, but once Helen Mirren joins the gang, they are rockin' and Rollin' and it's all action until the finish line!
Helen Mirren holding a gun! Need I say more? Great cast, entertaining,charming. I can't wait for the sequel this summer.

I seldom read movie reviews.  I never see eye to eye with the critics.  The cast is superb that is why I got the movie.  It did NOT disappoint.  I laughed so hard.  The interaction was fantastic.  The only problem is when Morgan Freedman died.
Get it - it is great
Very funny, had a really good time watching this movie. I hope the second follow up is just as good.
Good acting by entire cast makes for interesting plot and humor for retired spy and his former colleagues and adversaries.
great cast! john Malcovich was the highlight of the movie.  Government uses our heroes and throws them away.  Bruce is the standout .
Kept  my interest. Lots of action reguires suspension of disbelief.  Not for children. Would not recommend to friends but for 2.99 I am satisfied.
I had seen the movie several years, but my granddaughter wants to watch the new Red 2 movie, but had never seen the first one, so we downloaded for her.
This movie was fun and engaging! Not for those that go to the movies to see real life - more for those who like over the top action for entertainment.
All star cast makes this a great movie to watch, really funny with lots of action. One of Bruce's best by far.

My family loved this movie and we laughed.  We loved the premise of retired CIA agents that can still kick ass.  Bruce Willis and John Malkovich were amazing.  John was hilarious.  Helen Mirren was a delight and I was taken aback at how strikingly beautiful she can be.  Great movie.  I can't wait the see the sequel.
If you want non-stop shoot 'em action from many of the actors known for this type of action, you'll enjoy this one

We wanted to watch RED before we see the new RED movie coming out soon. Sooo glad we did. We enjoyed it and are now looking forward even more to seeing the new one. Lots of action and some laughs too. No nudity and little if any profanity which is rare these day.
The coolest actors having fun doing what they love. The beginning the the movie dragged a bit in the true Bruce Willis film set up way but once it got started....  I really enjoyed this film.
If you haven't seen this movie yet and like action movies with Bruce Willis, watch this one. The supporting actors are great in this flick.
Loved the action and the humor.  Can't wait for the next one!  I was really entertained.  It also reminded me of my own real life hero.

It was an interesting story line and the cast was well selected.  Hard to see them characterized as old but I suppose they are AARP eligible.  Overall, it was interesting from beginning to end hoping for a more.
We had seen the movie before but just did not remember the name. We rented it in prep for Red 2.
This is not a great movie, but it's not completely bad either.  The movie is kind of slow at first then it picks up momentum.  I enjoyed watching this and think anyone will like it as well.
Very entertaining, great cast; my husband and I both loved it and can't wait for the sequel which I've been told will be soon.

Another great movie from Bruce Willis.  Can't wait for Red 2 to come to theatres.  Don't go to the movies often because they are full of progressive liberal agendas that I won't support with my money, but Bruce Willis is conservative and I will support him.

...as long as you don't mind the violence.  The best thing about the movie is the confidence of characters as they carry out their deeds - and, the fact that society thinks the characters are done after years of service, and they definitely are not.
Wow - an all star cast and some memorable funny moments.  great to see toronto camouflaged as chicago but the story is unique and an absolute hit!
I enjoyed everything about this movie.  Malkovich's character is hilarious and the plot is very clever!  Can't wait for Red II!
We enjoyed the characters and the story line of this light comedy.  I would recommend if you like these actors and we are looking forward to the next "Reds".
This was a pretty good movie.  Actually more entertaining than I expected.  Can't wait to see the new one coming out soon.

This movie was so well done. You really came to like all of the good guys and wanted the bad guys to get what they deserved. I wasn't to graphic in any way and not to sappy either. The acting was so believable and it was thoroughly enjoyable!
It sort of drags at the end but some liked it. Watch it just for fun and what a cast.
This is a pretty good spy flick with lots of action and surprise surprise, no curse words! Enjoyed this movie quite a bit.
Was a great movie. It made you laugh and was a funny plot with a little love story as well.
The movie delivered. It was better than what the trailers indicated. Filled with great action scenes. Never a dull moment.

Perfect for a rainy Sunday with the family. A must see before Red 2 in the coming months!!

We can't wait!
Helen Mirren was the cherry on top of a fantastic cast of actors. All the action and humor I've come to expect from a Bruce Willis flick. Definitely a nice watch!

I laughed out loud several times and smiled through pretty much the whole thing. How can you not, when Malkovich teams up with Willis and Mary Louise Parker is doing her ditzy thing? Helen Mirren and massive ammunition, perfect together. I had to ask myself at one point, what is the plot? But who cares. It's totally smart assed with lots of explosions and gags. I'm sure Red 2 will be the same.

I loved this movie.  It was just a fun way to spend an afternoon.  The cast is amazing, and they all had such fun with it.  Helen Mirren is so spectacular.  I laughed out loud several times.  Well worth renting - I can't imagine anyone not enjoying it.  Worth the price just to see Bruce Willis reading a romance novel!
We decided to watch this because the second movie is coming out soon.  I'm a Bruce Willis fan and everyone played their parts well.  It was fun to watch and had good characterization and dialogue.

Liked this one. Another Knight and Day and Mission Impossible (with humor) type movie. Funny how the two American government officials are foreigners with thinly veiled accents. Oh well. And to see Mary Louise Parker play a damsel in distress is worth it. And to see John Malkovich play a conservative government questioning gun toting guy is worth it too. Actually if you fear your government don't watch this one. :-) Anyway the best scene is when Mirren's character is in a ball gown one minute and behind a machine gun pummeling a limo the next. Loved it. I think the love story aspect of this mixed with the guns and action make it a good movie for a guy and girl to see together. Perhaps.

It's great to see a cast that pushes each other to stretch in their performances.
It's even better when the overall production deserves no less.

Excellent! Good plot, new sneaky information from the consultants, wonderful acting and actors who know how to act--not the celebrity types. There are a couple of "oh, yeah, I've seen that before moments", but generally it worked well on all levels.
I've seen this a couple times and laugh alot.  John M is just great.  Can't wait to see Red 2

I really enjoyed REDS. It was feel a good suspenseful comedy.
Highly recommend it

Get it and see what I mean
A treat to see familiar faces still giving solid performances.  Am looking forward to the sequel coming out this summer.
Great group of actors looking like they are having fun.  I enjoyed the interaction between all of them and being an "older person" , they kicked butt.

Great movie with dark comedy. Parker and Willis play off each other very well. Well written. A fun movie if your just an average guy that doesn't want his movies to "make a statement" or be so PC they forget to be good. Cant wait for Red 2
Lots of stars, guns & fireworks; but poor plot, slapstick humor, waste of time. Would not recommend this to anyone.
Great action movie with great actors! Action, romance, great acting- what's not to like! I can't wait to see the sequel.
Well written and acted. Thoroughly enjoyed the movie; now looking forward to #2!  It was very easy renting from Amazon.
Good action film, Malkovich is great.  Great writing, some surprises.  Can't wait for Red 2 to come out this year.

Lots of things blowing up with Karl Urban, Morgan Freedman, John Malkovich, and Bruce Willis. What's not to like? John Malkovich was a hoot!  Loved Helen Mirren's character and was pleasantly surprised to see Ernest Borgnine pop in.
I'm not much of a action, thriller person, but, when I saw the previews, and the cast, I was hooked! It was just a fun movie to watch.
Not as action packed as I expected, but still kept me interested and made me laugh at times. I liked the romance part, and the older spy woman kicking butt!
I loved it. Bruce Willis, Morgan Freeman a d the others were great!  I can't wait for part two to vome out.

One of those quiet evenings with nothing worth watching...when my lovely wife suggested 'Red.'  I had not heard of it.

It was fun.  Action...seeing the old guys win...and just a fun movie.  If you have not seen this, you should.  The cast was great.
Funny, action packed and entertaining, probably not to go the movies but yes definitively recommended to watch it at home!!!!
Not good enough for anyone of these actors! Don't care for this movie! I would not have done this movie if I was anyone of this actors!

What an incredible cast!!!!! At first I wasn't sure I would engage with this film but after about ten minutes, I was hooked. Great story line, solid performances by the entire cast. Who knew John Malkovich could get any weirder? Can't wait to see the sequel.

For some mindless entertainment, it was a relaxing movie to watch! I think it was more the humor that they used in the story that made it entertaining. And maybe some of us can relate to being older and considered out of it!
Enjoyable. The cast made the movie. The generation gap in a spy story. We can't wait for the sequel with yet another great cast.
fun to watch lots of action and with a few twists, Bruce Willis is as always a greate tough guy
Fun action flick with "old" people kicking *ss. Good movie for an afternoon in. Semi-predictable, but is a movie with Morgan Freeman ever bad?
Can't wait for the sequel to come out to see what the characters have been up to. They are all trying so hard to just be everyday people.

I had never heard of this movie before we rented it. We had another couple over and they suggested we rent it. It was pretty good, we enjoyed all the cheesy jokes, and there were a couple of twists we didn't see coming. There are some predictable parts (quite a few) but that's to be expected in the genre. Overall I really enjoyed the movie. I was entertained. The predictability and cheesiness is why I gave it 4/5.

Worth my time. I enjoyed it!
It has it all - sweet romantic storyline, nicely developed action, wonderfully comical characters. I'd watch it over and over again. Cannot wait for the sequel
Great movie. Surpassed my expectations. Bruce Willis will always be one of my all time favorites. The entire cast had amazing chemistry and really pulled off this movie.
Thought movie ran on the slow side.  Acting was great.  Subtle humor great  I wish the sound could have surround.  Had to crank volume way up.
I thought Red was fun and entertaining. Amazon streaming is pretty good, it did freeze up twice for less than 5 seconds even with having high speed internet.
I loved this movie, it is one if those put your cares aside and watch a good movie.  I'm looking forward to the sequel.
Great story, great action, and great acting. Can't go wrong with this one. I would watch it again for sure.

Really enjoyed this movie. It was fun to watch with lots of action that kept us on the edge of our seat, and great characters that teamed up to help solve the mystery. The movie had a good pace and Bruce Willis was as charming as ever. Highly recommend it!
The characters have chemistry and work well together. Enjoyed the plot and pacing of the action. Great movie - and with Red 2 coming to theaters soon now is the time to watch the original.
The ALL STAR cast was absolutely hilarious in this movie.  I recommend this comedy to anyone.  You will not be sorry.
Great movie,  very entertaining even though it starts a little slow. Getting ready for the RED 2 movie coming out soon.
Good action adventure movie with some humor thrown in to boot.  Definitely worth seeing.  Star studded cast returns this summer for the sequel.

In Red you get to see the pros making a good movie and obviously having fun doing it. Malkovich, Dreyfuss, Cox, Freeman, Mirren and good old Willis himself--what more could you ask for. I enjoyed this movie immensely. But the greatest part of the movie was the actors and the great chemistry between them combining to make pure entertainment. Silly, hilarious and just plain good fun.

I'd call this a good action movie. Little bits of humor added in, like most action movies. They added a tiny twist with the agent pursuing the lead character (Bruce Willis) , in that they try to make him likeable. Seeing who the exact villain is not so straight forward, though not some huge surprise either. All in all, good action flick.
This flick had lots of funny action. Im a fan of all 5 main agents and it was cool to see em all together
Lots of action, quirky romance, and humor with a stellar cast of characters.  There are even lovable villains.  I'm really looking forward to the sequel!
I don't like shoot em up movies, but this one is so funny and smart. I enjoyed it very much!
This movie is hilarious and action packed. And it's on Blu-Ray. Can't ask for much more, and that's why it is one of my favorites!
It's unreal how many times I have watched this movie. I even owned a burned copy but had to have the blu-ray. And the sequel comes out in August, YES!
It's silly, full of action, something everyone in the family (older of course) enjoyed. Would recommend to everyone! That is all
worth the watch, especially since the sequel is about to be released. very funny and clever action movie with great cast.
One of the best recent films:  action humor acting touching exciting.  Marvelous.  Once a graphic novel but a fine film.
Love the action, characters, mix of story line and some comical content. Can't wait for Red 2 to come out!

Critics were mostly tepid on Red, which kept me from seeing it in the theater.  I should know not to listen to critics, by now.  I loved this flick!  It's nothing extraordinary, but I found the balance of story, humor and action to be perfect.  Great cast, fun time.  Can't remember where I read it, but someone had stated this is what s/he expected The Expendables to be, and that's a pretty good statement.  Red really is a fun ride.
A lot of Big name Stars and action in this flick. This is one of those I probably could watch several times, depending on my mood.
An older but good Bruce Willis film with Morgan Freeman. If you have not seen it I would recommend watching it.
Yup, it's a blow 'em up, shoot 'em up tour de force, but it employs several stars in loveable roles. Loveable spoof. looking forward to RED 2. since I heard there is going to be one.
Lots of Action a bit of Romance, conspiracy, great actors. Fun story-line. Not a kid movie. Fun for the average guy and girl.
Just a fun shoot'em up bang-bang movie that makes being middle aged not look so bad.  Crack a beer and have fun with it!
I wanted to see this one before the Red2 came out and I am glad I did.  This was a very cute, entertaining movie.  Lots of action with comedy mixed in.  Definitely primed to see the second one now!

Entertaining, but lots of holes in the story.
Worth watching but don't try to find logic or continuity.
John Malkovich is excellent, Bruce Willis is at home and Helen Mirren has a good sense of humor.
Hadn't really heard anything about this movie. Watched it. Laughed a lot. Loved it. Would definitely recommend it to anyone who likes silly comedies.

The story line is Die-Hard with another title.  Bruce is a good guy who has been painted bad by someone and then he has to find a way to fight back against unbelievable odds.  He incorporates the help of some previous friends to help him out and in the end is vindicated.  If you just want some action without having to think much in the movie then this is for you.
I love it. It is action packed, but not much nasty.  It is funny at the same time.  Can't wait for part two.
If I could, I'd give it 4 1/2 stars... Lots of action, fun characters (Willis and Parker were great together), and anything with Carl Urban is always good.
Funny, Smart, Sweet and action packed.  A perfect family film.  A great cast of older actors showing why they are still big name stars.
These 4 actors were brilliant. It was funny and enjoyable. I would recommend this for anyone that enjoys watching Bruce Willis.
One of the few movies I've been willing to watch multiple times! Well acted, family friendly, great story line and hilarious!!!
I guess I was expecting a dark comedy from this incredible cast -- and it wasn't bad, it was just a bunch of old people shooting up a bunch of other people.
Fun movie with a couple a good actors... Nothing super amazing about it. I bought it to watch before red 2 comes out.
Such a good movie. It is a good action movie, but at the same time very humorous. If you like the Die Hard series, you will probably like this movie as well
Great move with Bruce Willis in a comedy roll and all the other actors were great.  Cannot wait to see RED 2.

Great film.
Very clever dialogue and Helen mirren is fabulous. Even Bruce Willis is good. A lot of fun. Good sfx.

I know with all action movies you're required to suspend belief in the plausibility and not take them so serious.  But there are times when you just can't  stop from rolling your eyes. Individually these are some of my favorite actors (thus giving this movie an extra star).  Together.... Eh.  Bruce although playing the "cool, calm, quiet assassin" type seems to be just going thru the motions - been there, done that . Helen has her moments but whenever she fires some gun you giggle knowing she'd really be knocked on her ass. Malkovich plays his usual crazy.  The "Weeds" actress was the hardest sell.  Yes she's bored and sick of the life she's living, just wanting a little adventure, but she's too excepting of all the chaos that has come to her door.  Clearly some people liked this movie because there's a sequel coming, I just shrug "why?".
A little slow at the start but not so the rest of the movie. Great cast. Looking forward to Red 2.
Just a great simple story, with lots of action and great actors.  It looks like everyone on the set had as much fun making it as I had watching it.
One of those movies you can relate to..just a good story. Ive watched this movie a few times...and Ill watch 3 more times.
This is a very stupid movie.  Very predictable. Good actors but not worth it.  I couldn't wait to finish it.  It was that bad.

This is an very enjoyable movie which has a number of twists and turns but keeps the action and adventure at a high pitch.  Really enjoyed the dead pan performance by Helen Mirren and the classic characterization by John Malkovich.  Malkovich always seems to effortless make his character seem to be Malkovich himself.

65% Action
30% Comedy
5% Romance

Funny and has an excellent cast. Every member of my family enjoyed this from ages 25 to 60.
Again, I just love action movies! Also, enjoy Samuel Jackson's movies. I had seen about the last 5 min or so on TV several yrs ago, but never got to see the whole movie until I rented Red.

Seen it several times.  Fun for the family, not terribly violent but it has it's moments.  Kids 10 and 12 were able to enjoy the comic lines, action, etc.  Wife and I enjoyed seeing the older folks swing into action.
I would watch it again.. Great acting!! great plot. Bruce and the rest of the cast are worth the watch.
This is a great movie when you want to escape into a world where the good guys win.  Not overly complex but has a good plot.  There are several great lines to use in conversations.  I love the pig.

Just as described. Fast ship. Well pleased. THANKS!!!
Very entertaining movie.  I thoroughly enjoyed it and looking forward to seeing the next one.
I wasn't expecting a comedy - of sorts. It was enjoyable and had a little of everything: action, love story, bad guys, etc. I gave it a five because it was overall entertaining and fun.
Maybe not the best action movie ever made. Fast paced, action packed & funny. Worth it just for John Malkovich.
If you like most Bruce Willis movies you will also like this one. It is entertaining with a little humor thrown in.

This is a highly enjoyable film with a great cast that's a lot of fun to watch.  My friends told me about this movie and I finally got a chance to watch it and can see why so many people like this film.  Lots of action and gags to keep you laughing and on the edge of your seat.  This is perfect when you need an action comedy to lift your spirits and keep you entertained.
Great familiar cast, in appropriate rolls. Great Escape from reality. Good Action. Thoroughly enjoyed the movie. Going to play it for friends.

Love this movie! As to the streaming- great quality for about thirty minutes, then froze/ partial pixellated at about 30 minutes. Tried starting over, same effect at same place. There was no mechanism to report this onscreen. Ended up also buying the standard version, which worked fine. Amazon, please refund this--- and please re-digitize for the next customer.
This movie has the right mix of action and comedy to both hold one's attention and be fun to watch.

If you treat the violence as pretend, which we do in these kinds of movies, this movie has something for all adults.  Good mix of action, plot twist, humor and even a little romance thrown in...but not too much.

This is not a serious shoot-em-up...it's almost tongue-in-cheek violence...we laughed during several scenes.

Great cast that play off each other well.
All-star cast... funny... great movie.  I would recommend this movie to anyone.  Great story line... just enough action... just enough humour.  Luv this movie!
Better than most Die Hard movies. All the actors did a great job on this thriller, and the subject is timely given all the government scandals recently.
Great date movie, if your significant other likes action and a little humor.  We love Bruce W and having him team up with all the other guys was great.  Good script/storyline really helped, too.

This movie is a great semi light hearted action packed and well choreographed movie. The acting is also great and packed with a fantastic cast. I don't see anything wrong in this movie at all so I give it a top rating.
 Pan
This is a great movie with wonderful cast.  Its definitely worth the watch...action packed and humorous.. can't wait to see the sequel!
Because I belong to the 'over the hill gang' this was so great a movie for us.  We may be old and can't keep up with the young ones on 'tec', but we are more street wise!
One of the best fun action movies yet!  3rd time seeing it and I'm sure I will see it again in the future!
This movie does not take itself too seriously!  With none of the "obligatory sex scenes" of most movies these days, it is a fun movie for a stay at home date night.
This is a movie about some individuals who have to take care of taking care of our country, even after they have retired.  It is a very good comedy.

I like this one. Great actors, some humor, plenty of action, decent enough plot, well paced. Date movie? Could be. Viewing with spouse? Yes as limited foul language or blood splatter. Male only viewing? Yes. Decent enough acting job by Bruce.
Could retired spies pull this off?  Who knows -- but it's enjoyable to watch! A fan of the ensemble cast!
Outstanding Action and humor. The supporting cast really makes this movie worth watching - All-Star Cast.  Bruce Willis at his best! Must See...
Some parts are funny, great set of actors, but nothing really grabbed my attention(had to fight to stay awake and finish)..... overall okay.
I consider this to be one of bruce willis's best action funny movies I have ever seen..Not to mention thee all star cast...
How can you beat this lineup? It was a great movie. Funny and action packed. What more can you ask for?

This film was better than I thought it was going to be. There was a good quantity of action that was paired with comedy making the film interesting without being too serious. Also, there was a small love story on the side which makes it practically a good movie to watch for people interested in action, romance, and comedy. Overall, it was a good film and is worth the money to rent.

Bruce Willis plays a retired CIA agent who recruits his old team of colleagues to weed out the political corruption at Langley.  Bruce Willis and his team of retired agents are in their golden years, but that doesn't mean they are incapable of teaching up and coming rookies a few things about espionage.
Being an older person, I'm a sucker for the stories where older individuals reveal their prowess and skills.  And the cast is great!  This is a great movie-- highly recommend it!

Didn't remember seeing this before and wanted to rent it before the sequel comes out next month.  After getting into it remembered that I did see it before.  It is kind of a fun movie but there is not much substance.
There was good interaction between the charcters.  Looking forward to the Reds 2 coming out in a few months. Outstanding!

Wit was the second time we had seen it. We didn't realize until we got into it, but my husband and I both enjoyed it the first time, so we kept watching.  It is a fun shoot me up movie, lots of laughs and surprises.

I am new to Amazon & I love it. I only shop with gift
cards to limit my spending, or who knows what!
I recently bought this movie "Red" and then deleted
my tracking receipt. I tore off the plastic wrap on the
movie tonight and it was empty! I don't know how
to find who I bought it from, or even if I can prove
I got no movie.  so my review is "I hate it"!
Not only was this fun and action packed, it included a great cast. Coming out of retirement will never be the same.
If you like action films, this one is for you. Bruce Willis has his usual charm and wit. Leaves bad language out.

Saw this at the movies! When I saw they made a "Red 2", I had to rent this to refresh my memory. I watched it twice. In 48 hrs. Its lol funny!!! Can't wait to see "Red 2"!
The download and streaming was fast and clear. You gotta love technology :)
We enjoyed the movie. It was a good action with some light-heartedness also. It wasn't the usual Bruce Willis movie.
I love seeing older people take names and dish out punishment.  The things they do in this movie are really amazing.

I love action movies.  There is one scene in this movie that is just awesome: Bruce Willis just walking out of a car that gets hit and *is still moving*!  But the lack of effort by the RED team - not one is breathing hard, no hair is messed up, no smudges of dirt on the face or the WHITE CLOTHING - tells me that no one took this movie particularly seriously.  It just did not do the action justice.  I doubt I'll see the sequel.
This is a very funny movie with comical scenes. Not huge fan of Bruce Willis, but, he brought the movie together. Take time to watch the action packed movie.
Very entertaining and action packed. Romance, action, fast-paced, twists and turns, good guys and bad guys! It was lots of fun!
All star cast, great special effects.kind of predictable, but if you are looking for movie to just relax and take you on vacation: this is it!
An action packed filmed that keeps it light hearted and entertaining.  Bruce Willis, Morgan Freeman and John Malkovich are at their best.
Classic Bruce Willis. Good action, would recommend to any fan of Bruce Willis and action movies. Great actors and good story line.
The product arrived in excellent condition and very quickly.  The movie.....well that was not as excellent.  You would be wise to save your $ for something else.
Lots of action and a few surprises. A wonderful movie for a rainy Sunday. The cast much have had great fun filming this movie.
This is a great action flick. Very humorous and clever. It's Bruce Willis at  his best. A lot of fun.

This is a great movie for a Friday night! The cast is great, the characters very human, and the story is smart and fast-paced. But the movie never takes itself quite seriously, which makes it a ton of fun! It's really equal parts action thriller and comedy - very dark comedy at times.
What's not to like?? Great interaction, excellent cast, lots of action, and who wouldn't love Helen Mirren with a machine gun??? Bring on Red 2!!!
Great movie. I know its older but I hadn't seen it and was delighted to watch it. Thanks again amazon.
I watched this movie about 7 times on cable, But when they stopped showing it, I went right Amazon & purchased the DVD.
Awesome movie.  I've watch this movie probably about 5 times and it is just awesome.  Trust me you will love this movie!

I loved this movie from start to finish.  It got ho-hum reviews but I chalk that up to being a comic book movie and you're always going to have reviewers disappointed that it's not more like the source material.  Never reading the comics I found it a fun and well done.  All the actors are great the story is fun.  If you're a fan of any of the actors involved, this will be a good one to pick up.
Action packed and funny....not realistic....but it's entertaining. If you are looking for some good entertainment without having to think too much....this is the movie.

I liked RED and the stars that made it an enjoyable movie.
It was fun for me & my wife.

Hey I am a fan of action films, and this was the equivalent of my favorite stars coming out of retirement to entertain me; and it worked. Its a silly film, but very funny with some truly touching moments. We are all getting old, but should never take ourselves too seriously.

Last night's DVD was "RED" starring Bruce Willis and Morgan Freeman. I found it in the  five-dollar bin at Wal-Mart. Well, this one has to be one of the weirdest movies I've seen in decades. It's actually hard to explain. You have to see it to believe it. The movie is very funny, but it's largely done in a straight-faced style as an action movie and concerns a group of about a half-dozen retired CIA agents. In fact, the RED stands for "Retired, Extremely Dangerous." Okay, so these retired agents are having problems turning off their agentry. They're having trouble adjusting to normal life, to say the least. They still enjoy breaking heads, killing people in creative ways and riddling the landscape with machine-gun fire. Have you ever seen a house completely destroyed by machine-gun fire? Well, here's your chance. It's absurd, of course, but no more absurd than lots of stuff you see in action movies.

Some of the scenes are such that I haven't laughed so hard in years. Take one scene, for example. A woman agent fires a grenade rifle at a guy who has a gun. He sees the projectile coming and fires his own conventional gun to stop it. Well, the ultra-slow-motion photography picks up the grenade projectile and the bullet heading toward one another at supersonic speed, making a precise nose-to-nose impact and causing a humongous explosion. This one will leave you wondering how did they ever do it, but you'll be crying with laughter while you're thinking about it. All sorts of other stunts fill the movie. It's a frolicking good time. Trust me.

Do you have any questions about CIA activities? Well, this movie will flush them out into the open. I'm sure we all have strange ideas about ultra secret organizations such as the CIA and this movie preys on our anxieties. It's funny, but I'd sure like to know what a real CIA Agent thought of the movie. In this regard, there's an interesting extra feature attached to the movie and I'd suggest you watch it. It's an outstanding movie. The whole cast does an excellent acting job. It's well filmed. The stunts are magnificent. The story is far fetched, but, hey, this is a fine comedy so relax and enjoy.

Gary Peterson

I know movies can be considered an art form, a way to make a social/political statement, and/or a means of experimenting with style and content.  But let's face it -- many of us go to the movies not to be educated or culturally refined, but to be entertained.  I know I've enjoyed my share of brainless but fun blockbusters, such as the "Transformers" film series and the "A-Team" movie, and will gladly choose a Pixar or Disney movie over a more "arty" foreign film.  There are wonderful, art-worthy Oscar contenders that I will probably never watch again, simply because though I acknowledge they are good, they just weren't fun, while less artistically impressive movies will become a hit with me because of how much I enjoyed myself watching them.

"RED" is not an Oscar contender, and has absolutely no pretense of making a statement or considering itself high art.  But it's a blast nonetheless.

(For the record -- no, I have not read the comic series this is based on, so I'm judging the film solely on its own merits.)

Frank Moses is a "RED" (Retired, Extremely Dangerous) CIA agent, trying to grow accustomed to a quiet civilian life and having slightly flirty phone conversations with Sarah, the customer service agent at his pension office.  His attempts to relax and enjoy retirement are shattered when a hit squad attacks his house one night, sending him on the run.  With a rather reluctant Sarah in tow, he makes a cross-country trip to round up his old CIA buddies -- Joe, terminally ill but still kicking; Marvin, paranoid and deliciously crazy; Victoria, an elegant and soft-spoken "wetwork" agent; and ex-Russian secret agent Ivan.  As they put together the pieces and discover their team is being hunted down due to their connection with a military disaster in Guatemala, Frank is being pursued by young CIA agent and family man William Cooper, who follows orders with chilling precision but is seemingly unaware that he's being used as a tool by higher forces...

By far the best part of this film is the cast, containing such heavy hitters as Bruce Willis, Morgan Freeman, Helen Mirren, John Malkovich, and Richard Dreyfuss.  All of them look like they're having an absolute blast making this movie, and sling hot lead and sharp one-liners with equal zest.  John Malkovich chews quite a bit of scenery as Marvin, easily making him one of the funniest characters in the film, and Helen Mirren shines as Victoria, obviously having fun being a proper lady with a machine gun.  Richard Dreyfuss has only a few scenes as a smirky weapons dealer, but he hams it up enough that he's quite memorable.  Morgan Freeman plays against type as Joe and has relatively few scenes for being one of the top-credited names, and Bruce Willis seems to be running mostly on autopilot as Frank Moses, but they're still both fun to watch and have some good lines.  Mary-Louis Parker is sweet and spunky as Sarah, and Karl Urban (probably best known for "Star Trek") is mostly playing straight man to the rest of the crew as Cooper, but does his job well enough that I can see him carrying a "Bourne" style action series on his own.

The film operates solely on "Rule of Cool," eschewing realism for over-the-top explosions and loads of gunfire and fist-swinging action.  I don't particularly mind this, as I was enjoying the ride too much to nitpick at any errors.  This film knows what it is, and never has any pretense at art or high-minded storytelling.  The downside is that the plot tends to fall by the wayside in favor of fight and shoot-out scenes, but there's a good deal of humor, character development, and even a sweet romance to make up for any deficiencies in the plot.

Very fun and entertaining action flick, with good actors and memorable jokes and scenes carrying the movie quite well despite the fairly weak plot.  If you want a fun action flick, "RED" is a good choice, with something for just about everybody.  It's not going to win any awards, but it's sure going to entertain you.

P.S.  There's talk of a sequel... and reportedly when Helen Mirren was asked what it would take to get her into the sequel, she said "just send me a script."  I can only hope something good comes of this... :D
This wasn't really what I expected- but I enjoyed it anyway. I love all the stars that are in it as well. I found it funny as well.

One nice thing about "Red" is that it doesn't take itself seriously. And with a Malkovich and a Mirren (among others), it doesn't have to. Totally implausible but immensely entertaining, the film needs to be taken for what it is: entertainment to go with the popcorn and drink. An added treat is a rare appearance by then-93 year old Ernest Borgnine, who seems to have been acting virtually up until his demise. And the SFX lovers will have a feast...

This movie - which I have thoroughly enjoed watching multiple times - had pretty much everything I could ask for:

- Action: Lots and lots of action scenes that are very well done. Also, many explosions...

- Great Cast: Although some of the cast is slightly older than many of the current action stars, they do a superb job making this a movie which exceeds many of the recend action-genre releases. The characters were all well written and defined, with many developing well through the film.

- Humor and Fun: While not a comedy, the actors and writers managed to work many humorous and quirky scenes or lines into the movie.

- A Plot: Yes, this movie has a plot...not only that, it is very well written and developed.

This is one movie I added to my collection as I know I will watch it over, and over and over again.

OK - the story line is a bit over the top, but the characters are likeable in the extreme. Plenty of political intrigue and Mary Louise Parker steals the show with just a few lines. A great evening's diversion!

I must say that Red is a great movie. Bruce Willis, Morgan Freeman, John Malkovich & Helen Mirren give great performances. Someone is trying to kill Retired CIA agents. When someone comes into Frank's ( Bruce Willis) house and starts shooting the fun begins. Frank gets the old gang together and they find out who is trying to kill them, and they go after them. This movie has lots action and is fun to watch. You will enjoy it.

Robert Schwentke's "Red" has what can only be called a dream cast--Bruce Willis, Helen Mirren, Morgan Freeman, John Malkovich, Ernest Borgnine, Brian Cox, Richard Dreyfuss, Mary-Louise Parker, Karl Urban and James Remar. I just wish the script gave them better things to do. The idea of retired CIA operatives forced back into action is fun, if not exactly fresh. But though it's great fun to see Helen Mirren brandishing an AK-47 with at least as much aplomb as Sly Stallone, the script is awful. The story is made up of spare parts from other comic-action capers, and doesn't make sense half the time. The editing is so bad that I had to double-check that the director wasn't Michael Bay. It's only because I love all these actors that I give "Red" three stars; without them, I would give it two at the most. (But without them, I would never have bothered to see this movie.)

(NOTE: Brian Cox starred in another, much better film also titled "Red." It's a thriller about a grizzled Vietnam vet who takes revenge against the teenage punks who killed his dog. That's the movie named "Red" that you should see.)

I have watched this so many times I have begun to create scratches in the dvd and may need to upgrade to blu-ray. The characters are all so well played and have so much energy on their own. The comic that the movie is based on was written by Warren Ellis. Ellis is a writer that I tend to like and is the creator/writer of one of my favorite series: Planetary. However, I never read RED, so I really had no idea of what it was about other than what I saw in the trailer for the movie. It was a movie I really wanted to go see in the theater, but... well... last year was full of chaos which included, during the summer while RED was in theaters, our van, nearly literally, blowing up (while I was inside it, no less), so I never did make it into the theater to see it. That turns out to be (mostly) okay. There are a few scenes that would have been great to see on the big screen, especially the scene where Moses steps out of the police car (but, of course, at the theater we couldn't have immediately rewound that one and watched it, again, as my wife demanded we do), but, overall, it isn't the sort of movie that loses its impact in translation to the television screen since the movie is about the characters, not about the action.

The central character, Frank Moses, is played by Bruce Willis. This is just Bruce Willis being Bruce Willis, but, when you need an actor to play the part of Bruce, there is no one else that can do that, and he is great in this role. It would not surprise me if Willis was in Ellis' head as he wrote the character, although that is pure speculation on my part. At any rate, Bruce is completely enjoyable in his role as Frank Moses, and I can't really imagine anyone else doing the role the justice that Bruce gave it.

Mary-Louise Parker plays the love interest, Sarah Ross. I've never been a big Mary-Louise Parker fan and never thought her memorable in any of the roles I've seen her in. In fact, I have to look to see what I actually have seen her in, so little impact she has had on me. I mean, I know she's the lead in Weeds, but I've never seen that and don't have any immediate plans to do so. However, she was perfectly delightful in  this role. She really brought just the right mixture of naivete, awe, and enthusiasm to the part. I'm not saying that there's not another actress that could have played that role, but she did a great job in it, and I can't think of anyone, off the top of my head, that could have done it better.

Then there's Morgan Freeman. Freeman is another that is hired just to play himself, and, again, there is no one else that can play Morgan Freeman better. This is not to say that Freeman is incapable of a greater range than just playing himself; we've seen him in more than enough features to see that Freeman can play, pretty much, anything that is asked of him, but, when you need the, mostly, compassionate (grand)fatherly figure, there's probably no one better than Freeman, so he excels in his role. I can't say more than that without giving away pieces of the plot that you don't want to know about if you haven't seen  the movie.

Freeman's counterpart is played by Helen Mirren, and she's no less than awesome. I believe that Helen Mirren can do pretty much anything, and I don't think she's ever hired to just "be herself." I don't even know what that would mean as I don't think I've ever seen her do anything that had just become cliche for her. Certainly, I've never seen her behind a machine gun before, so that was pretty incredible and probably worth the whole movie. However, her role is really summed up in her comment to Sarah, "I kill people, Dear," just as if she was saying "I made some cookies." She was just perfect.

And that brings us to John Malkovich. Malkovich is like crab to me, and I don't mean that in a good way. I spent years and years eating crab because I felt like I ought to like it, but, every time I did, I came away from it with the thought, "I just don't like it." But I would try it, again, the next time because I felt likt I just ought to like it. Really, I did that for years before I finally decided, "you know, I really just don't like crab" and gave up on it for good. That is my experience with Malkovich. Any time he was in something, I would go into it with the thought that I ought to like it because it was John Malkovich, but I always came away just not liking the experience, most notably in Jonah Hex, which was just dreadful, I think, mostly, due to how horrible Malkovich was. There are a few notable exceptions, I suppose, such as Being John Malkovich, but he's not an actor I generally enjoy, mostly due to the fact that he's really just always the same in every role he's in. However, he was brilliant in RED! I'm not sure there is anyone else that could have pulled off this role and been believable in it. To some extent, he played the role the way he always is, but, it was like he turned his perfomance, this time, up to 11, and that's exactly what this called for.

The cast of villains, however, is somewhat divided. Richard Dreyfuss is amazing, as always, but Rebecca Pidgeon could have been replaced by anyone. Sure, the role wasn't written to stand out, but she did nothing to really make it her own, either. Karl Urban, on the other hand, was great. Hunky, pretty boy assassin. His complete seriousness in the role gave it the gravity and believability it needed, and he was pretty perfect opposite Bruce Willis. Besides, my wife says he's hot, although he needs to smile more. According to her. The last player for the villains is Julian McMahon. Although, I really enjoyed him as Dr. Doom in Fantastic Four; he is completely forgettable in his role as the vice president in RED and, probably, could have been replaced by just about anyone walking down the street.

I didn't get enough Ernest Borgnine. He's impossible not to love, and it's a great, albeit small, perfect role for him.

My immediate response to the movie was "I'm going to have to buy this one." And I will. My second response was, "The kids will love this," and they did. I'm not really saying it's a family movie, but it certainly is a great movie for my family. My younger son asked me if they were going to make a prequel for it. heh Interestingly enough, they did do some prequel comics to coincide with the release of the movie. I haven't read those, either, though. Unfortunately, although the movie did make money, it wasn't the blockbuster they'd hoped it would be, so it's unlikely that there will be anything further. I guess I'm okay with that. I think it does help illustrate, however, that, as a culture, our current love is for super heroes, not comic books in general. I think Hollywood is kind of stuck on the idea that anything translated from comics will be a hit, but even a wonderful movie like RED underperformed due to its lack of capes and tights, as the cliche goes.

If you're looking for a fun action/comedy, you should check RED out.

Retirement is boring, espcecially for ex Black Ops CIA operatives. Morgan Freeman gives a wonderful performance, as he always does. He is ultimately one of the best actors in the biz. Without spoiling it, I will just say you will enjoy it.

It's very rare these days to find an action movie or a comedy that has any thought behind it at all.  RED is brilliantly written.  So many movies are written for what I consider to be the "dumb" general public... very slapstick, typical, predictable humor.  This movie was entertaining without being predictable in any way.  The actors were fantastic in their delivery, and made for a genuinely funny action comedy.  John Malcovich makes the movie.  He is proof that most of the "funny" in comedy comes from the delivery of simple lines.  I HIGHLY recommend this movie.  Worth every minute!

I was a bit skeptical about this movie from just hearing a friend's overview of it, but it turned out to be one of my new favorite DVDs. With a star studded cast, RED is a movie I'd describe as funny and action packed with just a bit of romance following a "who done it" plot. I'd recommend it to all  my friends, family, and even my grandparents. The DVD itself shipped quickly and was in great shape. This is a must have for every collection.
I think this is Bruce Willis's funniest and yet action packed movie he's made.  It keeps you interested throught he entire movie.  Plus  the supporting cast is top notch

Loved this movie from my first time seeing it; and just wanted to add it to my collection.  The DVD came in it's original case & sleeve, in very good condition.  I would definitely buy from this seller again. thx!

We got this on a hunch and watched it this afternoon. The movie is filled with action and has some funny, even silly scenes that got several laughs from me. The seasoned cast seems to be having fun with the movie as well and offers the viewer some interesting situations with predictable results.

This one was good once but we will probably not watch it again. The ending of the movie is rather contrived and designed to leave the audience laughing, I didn't. The sound and video were both very good.

RED is not bad, for a movie about bunch of old retired agents who become targets by the same government they once killed for. R.E.D. stands for "Retired and Extremely Dangerous," and that's exactly what they are. The cast of RED is questionable for an action movie on paper (except for John McClane), but after seeing them all in action, it's better than I ever imagined. I had neutral expectations for this film, and I'm happy to say it's a pleasant surprise. Bruce Willis is as great as he's been in a while. That isn't saying much because he has not had much energy lately, but the rest of the cast picks up his slack tenfold. John Malkovich is amazing. He is genuinely hilarious. I thought it took some kind of special skill to make people laugh every time you spoke. He isn't a comedian, but whatever it is, he has it. The man is pure comedic genius in this movie. See it for him if nothing else. Malkovich isn't it though. There is also Helen Mirren in a fur coat and military boots, with a big @ss gun. Something worth mentioning is that they trained her well with those guns. The lady did not blink or close her eyes when shooting, like I'd expect her to. Just a straight face. I loved that. I really believed she was a trained killer. She is badass beyond words, yet manages to stay classy. How does she do it? The Queen with a freaking sniper rifle? Yes. And there is also Morgan Freeman. His last role was a President, now he's a retired agent. And he's great in his role, but don't expect to see him for too long.

The rest of the cast is good too. Ernest Borgnine made me smile in his tiny role, and I enjoyed Richard Dreyfuss. Yeah, the cast is full of older actors, but you won't be able to tell. I have to say that Mary Louise Parker was a little annoying at times, but she doesn't hinder the movie overall. The performances are great, but what else is there? The comedy aspect of the film is better than the action to be honest. I laughed a lot, and so did the rest of the audience. There are a couple of action scenes that will make you cheer though. Mainly the airport scene. I won't go into detail, but I think everyone will like that part, despite their feelings on the rest of the movie. Besides what I've mentioned, there isn't too much to else to the movie. I enjoyed the locale hopping. It was sort of Bond-like, but it stayed within the U.S. I also enjoyed the plot. It was slightly complex, but very easy to follow for the dimwits in the audience. No offense, to those of you who are dimwitted. :P I think this is a movie that will be very enjoyable to those of you who can ignore slight inconsistencies in the narrative and just enjoy the mayhem. Go see it!

Ok, when this movie first came out I said to myself...ehhh I should go see it. But then I didn't...and didn't...and didn't. Now I am kicking myself in the head for that horrible misjudgement. THIS MOVIE IS AWESOME!!!!!!! I mean come on, with an all star cast it was either going to be great, or horrible. I read the blurb and was expecting horrible, but got the opposite. Action packed, fully funny with sexy Karl Urban as the "bad guy". Just thinking about it makes me want to watch it again...in fact I think I will!

This is the movie that "Expendables" should have been, Bruce Willis, Morgan Freeman, Helen Mirren, and John Malkovich. Play former black ops CIA agents, who are retired. Until, a hit quad arrives to kill Frank. Played by Willis, that scene alone blows the entire expendables movie out of the water. Frank kills the  hit squad, and goes to assemble his team. So they can find out why they're being targeted, is it over the top, Yes. But unlike expendables, the group acts like a group, each one of them has a speciality. Mirren's Victoria is an assasin, Malkovich's Marvin is Crazy, they play it for laugh's. And Willis is this movie is a beast, the fight scene between him and the Cia agent trying to kill him in the office. Is just brutal, and it show's why you don't mess with the Elderly. Even when one of them dies, it's done respectfully, I highly recommend this movie it's millions times better than expendables, better acted. Better written, just overall better.

Public service announcement before I begin review.  Toonami is back!!!  Airs on Saturday Midnight, well technically Sunday, from 12:00 a.m. to 3:00 a.m., with an encore beginning at 3:00 a.m. to 6:00 a.m.  Tune in and support it.  Now on to my review.
